Sodium channel blockers identify risk for sudden death in patients with ST - segment elevation and right bundle branch block but structurally normal hearts .
【GOLD_E】
Sodium	chem
Sodiumchannel	geneN
【PRE_E】
Sodiumchannel	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

BACKGROUND : A mutation in the cardiac sodium channel gene ( SCN5A ) has been described in patients with the syndrome of right bundle branch block , ST - segment elevation in leads V1 to V3 , and sudden death ( Brugada syndrome ) .
【GOLD_E】
cardiacsodiumchannel	geneN
SCN5A	geneY
sodium	chem
【PRE_E】
sodiumchannelgene	geneY
SCN5A	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These electrocardiographic manifestations are transient in many patients with the syndrome .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The present study examined arrhythmic risk in patients with overt and concealed forms of the disease and the effectiveness of sodium channel blockers to unmask the syndrome and , thus , identify patients at risk .
【GOLD_E】
sodiumchannel	geneN
sodium	chem
【PRE_E】
sodiumchannel	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

METHODS AND RESULTS : The effect of intravenous ajmaline ( 1 mg / kg ) , procainamide ( 10 mg / kg ) , or flecainide ( 2 mg / kg ) on the ECG was studied in 34 patients with the syndrome and transient normalization of the ECG ( group A ) , 11 members of 3 families in whom a SCN5A mutation was associated with the syndrome and 8 members in whom it was not ( group B ) , and 53 control subjects ( group C ) .
【GOLD_E】
SCN5A	geneY
ajmaline	chem
procainamide	chem
flecainide	chem
【PRE_E】
ajmaline	chem
procainamide	chem
flecainide	chem
ECG	chem
ECG	chem
SCN5A	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Ajmaline , procainamide , or flecainide administration resulted in ST - segment elevation and right bundle branch block in all patients in group A and in all 11 patients with the mutation in group B .
【GOLD_E】
Ajmaline	chem
procainamide	chem
flecainide	chem
【PRE_E】
Ajmaline	chem
procainamide	chem
flecainide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A similar pattern could not be elicited in the 8 patients in group B who lacked the mutation or in any person in group C .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The follow - up period ( 37 + / - 33 months ) revealed no differences in the incidence of arrhythmia between the 34 patients in whom the phenotypic manifestation of the syndrome was transient and the 24 patients in whom it was persistent ( log - rank , 0.639 ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSIONS : The data demonstrated a similar incidence of potentially lethal arrhythmias in patients displaying transient versus persistent ST - segment elevation and right bundle branch block , as well as the effectiveness of sodium channel blockers to unmask the syndrome and , thus , identify patients at risk .

RESULTS : Exposure of in vitro differentiated subcutaneous adipocytes from young normal - weight females to 1 microgram / ml troglitazone for 72 h caused a reduction of both PAI - 1 secretion ( by 29 + / - 5 % ; p < 0.01 ) and PAI - 1 mRNA expression ( by 26 + / - 3 % ; p < 0.05 ) .

The apoptosome : heart and soul of the cell death machine .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
apoptosome	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Apoptosis is a fundamental biologic process by which metazoan cells orchestrate their own self - demise .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Genetic analyses of the nematode C elegans identified three core components of the suicide apparatus which include CED - 3 , CED - 4 , and CED - 9 .
【GOLD_E】
CED-3	geneY
CED-4	geneY
CED-9	geneY
【PRE_E】
CED-3	geneY
CED-4	geneY
CED-9	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

An analogous set of core constituents exists in mammalian cells and includes caspase - 9 , Apaf - 1 , and bcl - 2 / xL , respectively .
【GOLD_E】
bcl-2/xL	geneN
caspase-9	geneY
Apaf-1	geneY
【PRE_E】
caspase-9	geneY
Apaf-1	geneY
bcl-2	geneY
xL	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CED - 3 and CED - 4 , along with their mammalian counterparts , function to kill cells , whereas CED - 9 and its mammalian equivalents protect cells from death .
【GOLD_E】
CED-3	geneY
CED-4	geneY
CED-9	geneY
【PRE_E】
CED-3	geneY
CED-4	geneY
CED-9	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These central components biochemically intermingle in a ternary complex recently dubbed the `` apoptosome. `` The C elegans protein EGL - 1 and its mammalian counterparts , pro - apoptotic members of the bcl - 2 family , induce cell death by disrupting apoptosome interactions .
【GOLD_E】
inEGL	geneY
hebcl	geneN
【PRE_E】
EGL-1	geneY
bcl-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thus , EGL - 1 may represent a primordial signal integrator for the apoptosome .
【GOLD_E】
EGL-1	geneY
【PRE_E】
EGL-1	geneY
primordialsignalintegrator	geneN
apoptosome	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Various biochemical processes including oligomerization , adenosine triphosphate ATP / dATP binding , and cytochrome c interaction play a role in regulating the ternary death complex .
【GOLD_E】
cytochromec	geneY
adenosinetriphosphate	chem
ATP	chem
【PRE_E】
adenosinetriphosphateATP	chem
dATP	chem
cytochromec	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recent studies suggest that cell death receptors , such as CD95 , may amplify their suicide signal by activating the apoptosome .
【GOLD_E】
deathreceptors	geneN

【PRE_E】
CD95	geneY
apoptosome	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These mutual associations by core components of the suicide apparatus provide a molecular framework in which diverse death signals likely interface .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Understanding the apoptosome and its cellular connections will facilitate the design of novel therapeutic strategies for cancer and other disease states in which apoptosis plays a pivotal role .

We report here that a human degradation - resistant GLP - 2 analogue , h [ Gly2 ] - GLP - 2 significantly improves survival , reduces bacteremia , attenuates epithelial injury , and inhibits crypt apoptosis in the murine gastrointestinal tract after administration of topoisomerase I inhibitor irinotecan hydrochloride or the antimetabolite 5 - fluorouracil . h [ Gly2 ] - GLP - 2 significantly improved survival and reduced weight loss but did not impair chemotherapy effectiveness in tumor - bearing mice treated with cyclical irinotecan .

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RATIONALE : Drugs that are self - administered appear to vary in their potency and effectiveness as positive reinforcers .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Understanding mechanisms that determine relative effectiveness of drugs as reinforcers will enhance our understanding of drug abuse .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

OBJECTIVES : The hypothesis of the present study was that differences among dopamine transporter ( DAT ) ligands in potency and effectiveness as a positive reinforcers were related to potency and effectiveness as DA uptake inhibitors .

We here report the results of a genetic study in a sporadic case and in 5 affected patients from 2 families with autosomal dominant PHA1 .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

hMR	geneY

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Heparin - binding exosite of factor Xa .
【GOLD_E】
factorXa	geneY
【PRE_E】
Heparin-bindingexosite	geneN
factorXa	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recent studies have indicated that the basic residues Arg ( 93 ) , Lys ( 96 ) , Arg ( 125 ) , Arg ( 165 ) , Lys ( 169 ) , Lys ( 236 ) , and Arg ( 240 ) ( chymotrypsin numbering ) constitute an exosite in the catalytic domain of factor Xa that can effectively bind heparin only if the acidic N - terminal Gla domain of the proteinase was neutralized by physiological levels of calcium .

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Binding of a full - length heparin chain to this site of factor Xa in the presence of calcium makes a significant contribution to acceleration of the proteinase inhibition by antithrombin through a ternary complex bridging or template mechanism .
【GOLD_E】

This article reviews recent structural , mutagenesis and kinetic data that lead to identification of this exosite and discusses how the binding of protein or polysaccharide cofactors to this site of factor Xa can modulate the specificity and physiological function of this key coagulant enzyme in plasma .

Rofecoxib : a review of its use in the management of osteoarthritis , acute pain and rheumatoid arthritis .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Rofecoxib is a selective cyclo - oxygenase ( COX ) - 2 inhibitor which has little or no effect on the COX - 1 isoenzyme at doses up to 1000 mg / day .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
cyclo-oxygenase(COX)-2	geneY

【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】
Rofecoxib	cyclo-oxygenase(COX)-2	C4

Rofecoxib has greater selectivity for COX - 2 than celecoxib , meloxicam , diclofenac and indomethacin .
【GOLD_E】
celecoxib	chem
meloxicam	chem
diclofenac	chem
indomethacin	chem

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】

【PRE_R】
Rofecoxib	COX-2	C4

In well - controlled clinical trials , rofecoxib 12.5 to 500 mg / day has been evaluated for its efficacy in the treatment of osteoarthritis , acute pain and rheumatoid arthritis [ lower dosages ( 5 to 125 mg / day ) were generally used in the chronic pain indications ] .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the treatment of patients with osteoarthritis , rofecoxib was more effective in providing symptomatic relief than placebo , paracetamol ( acetaminophen ) and celecoxib and was similar in efficacy to ibuprofen , diclofenac , naproxen and nabumetone .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
paracetamol	chem
acetaminophen	chem
celecoxib	chem
ibuprofen	chem
diclofenac	chem
naproxen	chem
nabumetone	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem

celecoxib	chem
ibuprofen	chem
diclofenac	chem
naproxen	chem
nabumetone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Overall , both the physician 's assessment of disease status and the patient 's assessment of response to therapy tended to favour rofecoxib .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In patients with postsurgical dental pain , pain after spinal fusion or orthopaedic surgery , or primary dysmenorrhoea , rofecoxib provided more rapid and more sustained pain relief and reduced requirements for supplemental morphine use after surgery than placebo .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
morphine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】

Although naproxen sodium provided more rapid pain relief than rofecoxib in patients with primary dysmenorrhoea , the reverse was true after orthopaedic surgery : rofecoxib provided more rapid pain relief and less supplemental morphine was needed .

【GOLD_R】

Rofecoxib was as effective as naproxen in providing symptomatic relief for over 8700 patients with rheumatoid arthritis .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
naproxen	chem
【PRE_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
naproxen	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Compared with traditional NSAID therapy , rofecoxib had a significantly lower incidence of endoscopically confirmed gastroduodenal ulceration and , in approximately 13,000 patients with osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis , a lower incidence of gastrointestinal ( GI ) adverse events .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Rofecoxib was generally well tolerated in all indications with an overall tolerability profile similar to traditional NSAIDs .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The most common adverse events in rofecoxib recipients were nausea , dizziness and headache .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In conclusion , rofecoxib is at least as effective as traditional NSAID therapy in providing pain relief for both chronic and acute pain conditions .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Rofecoxib provides an alternative treatment option to traditional NSAID therapy in the management of symptomatic pain relief in patients with osteoarthritis .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Initial data from patients with primary dysmenorrhoea and postoperative pain are promising and further trials may confirm its place in the treatment of these indications .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Rofecoxib has also shown promising results in patients with rheumatoid arthritis and is likely to become a valuable addition to current drug therapy for this patient population .
【GOLD_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
Rofecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Importantly , rofecoxib is associated with a lower incidence of GI adverse events than traditional NSAIDs making it a primary treatment option in patients at risk of developing GI complications or patients with chronic conditions requiring long term treatment .
【GOLD_E】
rofecoxib	chem
【PRE_E】
rofecoxib	chem

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Gitelman 's variant of Bartter 's syndrome , inherited hypokalemic alkalosis , is caused by mutation in the thiazide - sensitive NaCl co - transporter ( NCCT ) .
【GOLD_E】
thiazide	chem

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The diagnosis was suspected in five children according to clinical criteria .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Different forms of therapy , potassium and magnesium substitution , spironolactone and indomethacin failed to fully correct hypokalemia and hypomagnesemia , but markedly improved growth velocity and normalized IGF - I levels in the three patients with short stature .

Here , we report for the first time the purification from human fibroblasts of a approximately 78 kDa salicylate binding protein with sequence identity to immunoglobulin heavy chain binding protein ( BiP ) .

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The present study investigates enzyme activities of the urea cycle , transamidinase and ornithine - proline inter - conversion in the hypertrophied kidney after unilateral nephrectomy in mice .
【GOLD_E】
transamidinase	geneY
ornithine	chem
proline	chem
【PRE_E】
urea	chem
transamidinase	chem
ornithine-proline	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Surgical removal of the left kidney in mice led to compensatory enlargement of the right kidney after 1 and 14 days .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This renal growth was associated with an increase in glomerular volume ( but not number ) and enlargement of the proximal convoluted tubules .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The total renal protein content increased in proportion to the increase in kidney weight , but the protein per gram weight of kidney did not change .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The specific activity of only ornithine aminotransferase ( OAT ) , the rate - limiting enzyme in the conversion of ornithine to proline , increased in 2 weeks of hypertrophy .

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

While the increase in total OAT activity was much more than the increase in kidney weight , all other enzymes increased more or less in proportion to the increase in renal mass .

Analgesia and COX - 2 inhibition .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

While non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( NSAIDs ) are the mainstay of therapy for the management of acute pain and rheumatoid arthritis , toxicity associated with chronic administration limits their benefit - to - risk relationship in many patients .
【GOLD_E】
steroidal	chem
【PRE_E】
steroidal	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A series of studies is reviewed that assesses the relationship between cytokines released at the site of tissue injury and NSAID analgesia , and the in vivo selectivity of a selective cyclooxygenase ( COX ) - 2 inhibitor ( celecoxib ) in comparison to a dual COX - 1 / COX - 2 inhibitor ( ketorolac ) .

Three replicate studies in the oral surgery model of acute pain used submucosal microdialysis sample collection for the measurement of prostaglandin E2 ( PGE2 ; a product of both COX - 1 and COX - 2 ) and thromboxane B2 ( as a biomarker for COX - 1 activity ) with parallel assessments of pain .

The present study was initiated to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Haemate - P ( Humate - P in North America ) ( anti - hemophilic FVIII / VWF complex [ human ] dried , pasteurized ) dosed in ristocetin cofactor units ( VWF : RCo ) in the treatment of von Willebrand disease ( VWD ) patients in Canada .
【GOLD_E】

FVIII	geneY
VWF	geneY
【PRE_E】
Haemate-P	geneY
FVIII	geneN
VWF	geneN
ristocetincofactorunits	geneN
VWF	geneN
RCo	geneN
vonWillebrand	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This retrospective data collection reviewed the medical records of VWD patients treated under the Canadian Emergency Drug Release Program from November 22 , 1991 , to April 30 , 1996 .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Data collection was accomplished by on - site retrieval from source data for 97 patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Dosing was based on the German package insert , which lists only Factor VIII : C ( FVIII : C ) units , which were converted in the study analysis to VWF : RCo units based on the analysis of the individual manufactured lots of product used in these patients ( average ratio of 2.6 IU VWF : RCo per IU FVIII : C ) .
【GOLD_E】
FactorVIII:C	geneY
FVIII:C	geneY
FVIII:C	geneY
【PRE_E】
FactorVIII	geneY
FVIII:C	geneN
VWF	geneN
RCo	geneN
VWF	geneY
RCo	geneN
FVIII	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Twenty five different lots of Haemate - P / Humate - P were used to treat 437 different events in the 97 study patients ( 344 hemorrhagic events , 73 surgical interventions and 20 prophylactic infusion cycles ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Overall , the median dose of concentrate per infusion used to treat surgical events was 69.1 IU VWF : RCo / kg ( range 11.9 - 222.8 ) ; bleeding events 55.3 IU VWF : RCo / kg ( range 17.1 - 227.5 ) and prophylaxis 41.6 IU VWF : RCo / kg ( range 34.6 - 81.0 ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
VWF	geneY

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A pediatric sub - population analysis of the patient population reported `` excellent / good `` efficacy in 100 % ( 17 / 17 ) of treatment events in infants , 95 % ( 155 / 164 ) in children , and 94 % ( 76 / 81 ) in adolescent patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】

Related adverse events ( AEs ) were observed in only 4 ( 4 % ) patients and were not deemed to be serious .

The findings in this study confirm the safety and efficacy of Haemate - P / Humate - P using VWF : RCo dosing in pediatric and adult patients with various types of VWD .

Hepatotoxicity of commonly used drugs : nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs , antihypertensives , antidiabetic agents , anticonvulsants , lipid - lowering agents , psychotropic drugs .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
antihypertensives	chem
anticonvulsants	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Hepatotoxic adverse drug reactions have contributed to the decline of many promising therapies , even among mainstream medication classes ( bromfenac and troglitazone are recent examples ) .
【GOLD_E】
bromfenac	chem
troglitazone	chem
【PRE_E】
bromfenac	chem
troglitazone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The spectrum of nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drug - related liver toxicity continues to expand , with reports in children , interactive toxicity in persons with hepatitis C , and recognition of the toxicity of both the preferential and selective cyclooxygenase - 2 inhibitors .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】
hepatitisC	cyclooxygenase-2	C4

Of the antihypertensive agents , methyldopa is now rarely prescribed and adverse effects are reported infrequently , whereas cases of liver injury associated with the angiotensin receptor and converting enzyme inhibitors are increasingly reported .
【GOLD_E】
angiotensin	chem

convertingenzyme	geneY
【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
thiazolidinediones	chem
troglitazone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although liver injury has been associated with the `` statins , `` the frequency of such toxicity is lower than that of the background population and the value of biochemical monitoring remains unproved .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Newer concepts in anticonvulsant hepatotoxicity have been the recognition of the reactive metabolite syndrome , delineation of the risk factors for valproic acid toxicity , the potential role of carnitine in preventing valproic acid hepatotoxicity , and the toxicity of second - line antiepileptic drugs .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
serotonin	chem
【PRE_E】
serotonin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The focus of the review is the hepatotoxicity of commonly used drugs with particular reference to recent and novel reports of toxicity .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A molecular mechanism of action of theophylline : Induction of histone deacetylase activity to decrease inflammatory gene expression .
【GOLD_E】

histonedeacetylase	geneN
【PRE_E】
theophylline	chem
histonedeacetylase	geneN
【GOLD_R】
theophylline	histonedeacetylase	C3
【PRE_R】

The molecular mechanism for the anti - inflammatory action of theophylline is currently unknown , but low - dose theophylline is an effective add - on therapy to corticosteroids in controlling asthma .
【GOLD_E】
theophylline	chem
theophylline	chem
【PRE_E】
theophylline	chem
theophylline	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Corticosteroids act , at least in part , by recruitment of histone deacetylases ( HDACs ) to the site of active inflammatory gene transcription .
【GOLD_E】
histonedeacetylases	geneN
HDACs	geneN
Corticosteroids	chem
【PRE_E】
histonedeacetylases	geneN
HDACs	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

They thereby inhibit the acetylation of core histones that is necessary for inflammatory gene transcription .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
histones	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We show both in vitro and in vivo that low - dose theophylline enhances HDAC activity in epithelial cells and macrophages .
【GOLD_E】
HDAC	geneN
theophylline	chem
【PRE_E】
theophylline	chem
HDAC	geneN
【GOLD_R】
theophylline	HDAC	C3
【PRE_R】
theophylline	HDAC	C3

This increased HDAC activity is then available for corticosteroid recruitment and predicts a cooperative interaction between corticosteroids and theophylline .
【GOLD_E】
HDAC	geneN
corticosteroid	chem
corticosteroids	chem
theophylline	chem
【PRE_E】
HDAC	geneN
corticosteroid	chem
theophylline	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This mechanism occurs at therapeutic concentrations of theophylline and is dissociated from phosphodiesterase inhibition ( the mechanism of bronchodilation ) or the blockade of adenosine receptors , which are partially responsible for its side effects .
【GOLD_E】
theophylline	chem
adenosine	chem
phosphodiesterase	geneN
adenosinereceptors	geneN
【PRE_E】
theophylline	chem
phosphodiesterase	geneN
adenosinereceptors	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thus we have shown that low - dose theophylline exerts an anti - asthma effect through increasing activation of HDAC which is subsequently recruited by corticosteroids to suppress inflammatory genes .
【GOLD_E】
HDAC	geneN
theophylline	chem
corticosteroids	chem
【PRE_E】

Metformin is an effective hypoglycemic drug that lowers blood glucose concentrations by decreasing hepatic glucose production and increasing glucose disposal in skeletal muscle ; however , the molecular site of metformin action is not well understood .

AMP - activated protein kinase ( AMPK ) activity increases in response to depletion of cellular energy stores , and this enzyme has been implicated in the stimulation of glucose uptake into skeletal muscle and the inhibition of liver gluconeogenesis .

During polyamine catabolism , spermine and spermidine are first acetylated by spermidine / spermine N ( 1 ) - acetyltransferase ( SSAT ) and subsequently oxidized by polyamine oxidase ( PAO ) to produce spermidine and putrescine , respectively .

Substrate specificity using lysates of oxidase - transfected HEK - 293 cells revealed that the newly identified oxidase strongly favoured spermine over N ( 1 ) - acetylspermine and that it failed to act on N ( 1 ) - acetylspermidine , spermidine or the preferred PAO substrate , N ( 1 ) , N ( 12 ) - diacetylspermine .

Several haloalkenes are metabolized in part to nephrotoxic cysteine S - conjugates ; for example , trichloroethylene and tetrafluoroethylene are converted to S - ( 1,2 - dichlorovinyl ) - L - cysteine ( DCVC ) and S - ( 1,1,2,2 - tetrafluoroethyl ) - L - cysteine ( TFEC ) , respectively .

Most halogenated cysteine S - conjugates are metabolized by cysteine S - conjugate beta - lyases to pyruvate , ammonia , and an alpha - chloroenethiolate ( with DCVC ) or an alpha - difluoroalkylthiolate ( with TFEC ) that may eliminate halide to give a thioacyl halide , which reacts with epsilon - amino groups of lysine residues in proteins .

【PRE_R】

Phenylbutazone ( PBZ ) was administered to six calves intravenously ( i.v . ) and orally at a dose rate of 4.4 mg / kg in a three - period cross - over study incorporating a placebo treatment to establish its pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic properties .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Extravascular distribution was determined by measuring penetration into tissue chamber fluid in the absence of stimulation ( transudate ) and after stimulation of chamber tissue with the mild irritant carrageenan ( exudate ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

PBZ pharmacokinetics after i.v . dosage was characterized by slow clearance ( 1.29 mL / kg / h ) , long - terminal half - life ( 53.4 h ) , low distribution volume ( 0.09 L / kg ) and low concentrations in plasma of the metabolite oxyphenbutazone ( OPBZ ) , confirming previously published data for adult cattle .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

OPBZ	chem

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Passage into exudate was slow and limited , and penetration into transudate was even slower and more limited ; area under curve values for plasma , exudate and transudate after i.v . dosage were 3604 , 1117 and 766 microg h / mL and corresponding values after oral dosage were 2435 , 647 and 486 microg h / mL .

To address questions about the specificity of receptor : G protein coupling , the regulation of cAMP formation in vivo and the contribution of G ( i ) - mediated pathways that do not involve adenylyl cyclase , we studied platelets from mice that lacked the alpha subunits of one or more of the three most abundantly expressed G ( i ) family members and compared the results with platelets from mice that lacked the PGI ( 2 ) receptor , IP .

From these results we conclude that 1 ) cAMP levels in circulating platelets reflect ongoing signaling through G ( i2 ) , G ( z ) , and IP , but not G ( i3 ) ; 2 ) platelet epinephrine ( alpha ( 2A ) - adrenergic ) and ADP ( P2Y12 ) receptors display strong preferences among G ( i ) family members with little evidence of redundancy ; and 3 ) these receptor preferences do not extend to G ( i3 ) .

To improve on this alpha2 - adrenoceptor subtype selectivity , a series of yohimbine dimers ( varying from n = 2 to 24 spacer atoms ) were prepared and evaluated for receptor binding on human alpha2 - adrenoceptor subtypes expressed in Chinese hamster ovary cells .
【GOLD_E】

Each dimeric analog showed higher affinities for alpha2A - and alpha2C - adrenoceptor versus the alpha2B - adrenoceptor ; and yohimbine dimers with spacers of n = 2 , 3 , 4 , 18 , and 24 exhibited selectivity for the alpha2C - adrenoceptor .
【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The yohimbine dimers n = 3 and n = 24 showed the highest potency and selectivity ( 32 - and 82 - fold . respectively ) for the alpha2C - adrenoceptor in receptor binding and in functional studies ( 42 - and 29 - fold , respectively ) measuring cAMP changes using a cell - based luciferase reporter gene assay .
【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These findings demonstrate that the addition of spacer linkages to bivalent yohimbine molecules provides a successful approach to the development of ligands that are potent and highly selective for the alpha2C - adrenoceptor .

This study shows that the potency of GW660511X in comparison with omapatrilat is more than 100 - fold lower in human , but less than 10 - fold lower in rat plasma , suggesting that rat may not be a suitable in vivo model for the evaluation of ACE / NEP inhibition in relation to effects in humans .

【GOLD_E】
mexiletine	chem
【PRE_E】
mexiletine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The ventricular tachyarrhythmias associated with the LQT3 syndrome are typically bradycardia - dependent .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , some episodes can be associated with exercise or emotional stress , suggesting a different arrhythmogenic mechanism when sympathetic activity predominates .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This study examined the potential arrhythmogenic mechanisms during periods of autonomically mediated transient heart rate acceleration in a canine anthopleurin - A model of LQT3 syndrome .
【GOLD_E】
anthopleurin-A	geneY
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Using plunge needle electrodes , transmural unipolar electrograms of the left ventricle were recorded from endocardial ( Endo ) , mid - myocardial ( Mid ) and epicardial ( Epi ) sites .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The activation - recovery interval ( ARI ) was measured to estimate local refractoriness .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The cardiac cycle length was gradually shortened by cessation of vagal stimulation ( vagal stimulation protocol ( VSP ) ) , and intramural electrograms and onset mode of ventricular tachyarrhythmias were analyzed in 7 experiments .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The VSP was performed 8 times before and 5 times after administration of mexiletine in each experiment .
【GOLD_E】
mexiletine	chem
【PRE_E】
VSP	geneN
mexiletine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Before mexiletine , vagal stimulation slowed the heart rate and created large transmural ARI dispersion because of a greater ARI prolongation at Mid rather than Epi / Endo sites .
【GOLD_E】
mexiletine	chem
【PRE_E】
mexiletine	chem
Epi	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

After cessation of vagal stimulation , unipolar electrograms started to show ARI alternans and ventricular premature beats developed sporadically .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Sustained ventricular tachyarrhythmias were induced in 12 of the 56 trials of the VSP .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
VSP	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Mexiletine attenuated transmural ARI dispersion , and neither ARI alternans nor ventricular tachyarrhythmias was observed during all 35 trials of the VSP after mexiletine administration .
【GOLD_E】

Acetylcholinesterase ( AChE ) predominates in the healthy brain , with butyrylcholinesterase ( BuChE ) considered to play a minor role in regulating brain acetylcholine ( ACh ) levels .
【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_R】

Both enzymes therefore represent legitimate therapeutic targets for ameliorating the cholinergic deficit considered to be responsible for the declines in cognitive , behavioral and global functioning characteristic of AD .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The two enzymes differ in substrate specificity , kinetics and activity in different brain regions .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Experimental evidence from the use of agents with enhanced selectivity for BuChE ( cymserine analogues , MF - 8622 ) and the dual inhibitor of both AChE and BuChE , rivastigmine , indicates potential therapeutic benefits of inhibiting both AChE and BuChE in AD and related dementias .

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_R】

BACKGROUND : In a proliferating tumor , locally secreted polypeptide growth factors , which have autocrine and paracrine functions , induce vascularization essential for tumor growth and metastasis .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These growth factors may serve as targets for tumor therapy .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We have shown that the heparinoid pentosan polysulfate ( PPS ) can block growth of subcutaneous human tumor xenografts in nude mice and angiogenesis induced by the heparin - binding , Kaposi 's sarcoma - derived fibroblast growth factor ( K - FGF ) .
【GOLD_E】
Kaposi'ssarcoma-derivedfibroblastgrowthfactor	geneN
K-FGF	geneN
【PRE_E】

PPS	chem

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】
heparinoidpentosanpolysulfate	Kaposi'ssarcoma-derivedfibroblastgrowthfactor	C4
PPS	Kaposi'ssarcoma-derivedfibroblastgrowthfactor	C4
PPS	K-FGF	C4

PURPOSE : The purpose of this study was to determine whether PPS might also interfere with stimulation of endothelial cells by other growth factors released from tumor cells and whether the promising antitumor effects of PPS extend to other human tumor cell lines .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
PPS	chem
PPS	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We studied the effects of PPS on stimulation by heparin - binding growth factors released from seven human tumor cell lines in vitro and on tumors growing from these cell lines in athymic nude mice .
【GOLD_E】
heparin-bindinggrowthfactors	geneN
【PRE_E】
PPS	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

METHODS : Seven human cell lines established from breast , prostate , epidermoid , and lung carcinomas and rhabdomyosarcoma were used in in vivo as well as in vitro studies of the effects of PPS .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
PPS	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We also studied in vitro the effects of PPS on growth factor - induced colony formation of normal rat kidney fibroblasts and human adrenal carcinoma cells .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
PPS	chem
growthfactor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : The tumor cell lines released growth factors into their media that stimulated growth of endothelial and epithelial cells as well as fibroblasts .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Heparin - affinity chromatography showed that heparin - binding growth factors contributed substantially to this paracrine activity and that PPS inhibited this stimulus .
【GOLD_E】
heparin-bindinggrowthfactors	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Six of the seven tumor cell lines were resistant to PPS in soft - agar cloning assays and hence did not appear to depend on autocrine stimulation by the heparin - binding growth factors .
【GOLD_E】
heparin-bindinggrowthfactors	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In contrast to this in vitro resistance , subcutaneous growth of tumors from all cell lines in athymic nude mice was inhibited in a dose - dependent fashion by daily intraperitoneal injections of PPS .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSIONS : We conclude that heparin - binding growth factors contribute substantially to tumor growth in vivo and that PPS acts by blocking the paracrine effects of heparin - binding growth factors released from the tumor cells .
【GOLD_E】
heparin-bindinggrowthfactors	geneN
heparin-bindinggrowthfactors	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

IMPLICATION : PPS could become a novel treatment tool targeting tumor growth factors .

The safety , toxicity and pharmacokinetics of oral tazarotene were determined over 12 weeks of treatment in 34 patients with advanced cancer .
【GOLD_E】
tazarotene	chem
【PRE_E】
tazarotene	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Commonly seen toxicities were mucocutaneous symptoms , musculoskeletal pain and headache .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Dose - limiting toxicities were hypercalcaemia , hypertriglyceridaemia and musculoskeletal pain .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The maximum tolerated dose of tazarotene in this schedule is 25.2 mg day ( - 1 ) .
【GOLD_E】
tazarotene	chem
【PRE_E】
tazarotene	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Plasma concentrations of tazarotenic acid were found to peak rapidly within 1 - 3 h of dosing and thereafter declined quickly .
【GOLD_E】
tazarotenicacid	chem
【PRE_E】
tazarotenicacid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The C ( max ) and AUC values on day 0 , and weeks 2 and 4 were similar indicating no drug accumulation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The dose - normalised C ( max ) and AUC values at different dose levels and different study days appeared to be similar indicating linear pharmacokinetics .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

No objective responses were seen , although stable disease was seen in six out of eight evaluable patients receiving the three highest dose levels of tazarotene ( 16.8 , 25.2 or 33.4 mg day ( - 1 ) ) .
【GOLD_E】
tazarotene	chem
【PRE_E】
tazarotene	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We conclude that oral tazarotene is well tolerated when administered daily for 12 weeks , has a favourable toxicity profile compared with other retinoids and merits further investigation as an anticancer therapy .

Although many beta1 - receptor antagonists and beta2 - receptor agonists have been used in pharmacotherapy for many years their pharmacological properties at all three known subtypes of beta - adrenergic receptors are not always well characterized .

Travoprost acid ( [ + ] - fluprostenol ) was the most FP - receptor - selective compound , exhibiting a high affinity ( Ki = 35 + / - 5 nM ) for the FP receptor , and minimal affinity for DP ( Ki = 52,000 nM ) , EP1 ( Ki = 9540 nM ) , EP3 ( Ki = 3501 nM ) , EP4 ( Ki = 41,000 nM ) , IP ( Ki > 90,000 nM ) , and TP ( Ki = 121,000 nM ) receptors .

Here , we explore whether 1 ) glucose , metformin , or leptin regulates AMPK activity in isolated islets from rodent and human and 2 ) whether changes in AMPK activity modulate insulin secretion from human islets .
【GOLD_E】
AMPK	geneN
AMPK	geneN
insulin	geneY
glucose	chem
metformin	chem
【PRE_E】
glucose	chem
metformin	chem
leptin	geneY
AMPK	geneN
AMPK	geneN
insulin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】
glucose	leptin	C3
metformin	leptin	C3
metformin	AMPK	C3
metformin	AMPK	C3
metformin	insulin	C3

Increases in glucose concentration from 0 to 3 and from 3 to 17 mM inhibited AMPK activity in primary islets from mouse , rat , and human , confirming previous findings in insulinoma cells .
【GOLD_E】
AMPK	geneN
glucose	chem
【PRE_E】
glucose	chem
AMPK	geneN
【GOLD_R】
glucose	AMPK	C4
【PRE_R】

Incubation with metformin ( 0.2 - 1 mM ) activated AMPK in both human islets and MIN6 beta - cells in parallel with an inhibition of insulin secretion , whereas leptin ( 10 - 100 nM ) was without effect in MIN6 cells .
【GOLD_E】
metformin	chem
insulin	geneN
AMPK	geneN
【PRE_E】
metformin	chem
AMPK	geneN
insulin	geneY
leptin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
metformin	AMPK	C3
metformin	insulin	C4
【PRE_R】
metformin	AMPK	C4
metformin	insulin	C4

These studies demonstrate that AMPK activity is subject to regulation by both glucose and metformin in pancreatic islets and clonal beta - cells .
【GOLD_E】
AMPK	geneN
glucose	chem
metformin	chem
【PRE_E】
AMPK	geneN

metformin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】
AMPK	glucose	C3
AMPK	metformin	C3

The inhibitory effects of metformin on insulin secretion may therefore need to be considered with respect to the use of this drug for the treatment of type 2 diabetes .

The mechanism of action of retinoic acid ( RA ) is of broad relevance to cell and developmental biology , nutrition , and cancer chemotherapy .
【GOLD_E】

RA	chem
【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RA is known to induce expression of the Burkitt 's lymphoma receptor 1 ( BLR1 ) gene which propels RA - induced cell cycle arrest and differentiation of HL - 60 human myeloblastic leukemia cells , motivating the present analysis of transcriptional regulation of blr1 expression by RA .

The ability of this cis - acting RAR - RXR binding element to activate transcription in response to RA also depended on downstream sequences where an octamer transcription factor 1 ( Oct1 ) site and a nuclear factor of activated T cells ( NFATc ) site between this element and the transcriptional start , as well as a cyclic AMP response element binding factor ( CREB ) site between the transcriptional start and first exon of the blr1 gene , were necessary .

This cis - acting element approximately 1 kb upstream of the transcriptional start consists of two GT boxes that bind RAR and RXR in a nuclear protein complex that also contains Oct1 , NFATc3 , and CREB2 bound to their cognate downstream consensus binding sites .

AT1 - receptor antagonism in hypertension : what has been learned with irbesartan ?
【GOLD_E】
irbesartan	chem
AT1	geneY
【PRE_E】
AT1-receptor	geneY
irbesartan	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Irbesartan is a long - acting angiotensin II antagonist acting specifically at the level of the Type 1 - receptor subtype ( AT1 - receptor ) .
【GOLD_E】
AT1	geneY
angiotensinII	geneY
Irbesartan	chem
angiotensinII	chem
【PRE_E】
Irbesartan	chem
angiotensinII	geneY
Type1-receptor	geneY
AT1-receptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
Irbesartan	angiotensinII	C6
【PRE_R】
Irbesartan	AT1-receptor	C5

This compound lowers blood pressure dose - dependently in hypertensive patients and has a placebo - like tolerability .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The antihypertensive efficacy of irbesartan is greatly enhanced by the coadministration of a diuretic , and fixed - dose combinations of irbesartan and hydrochlorothiazide are now available .
【GOLD_E】
irbesartan	chem
irbesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
irbesartan	chem
irbesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Irbesartan - based treatment appears especially effective for high - risk patients , such as those with diabetes , renal disease and cardiac hypertrophy .
【GOLD_E】
Irbesartan	chem
【PRE_E】
Irbesartan	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In patients with Type 2 diabetes , irbesartan delays the development of nephropathy as well as the progression of renal failure .
【GOLD_E】
irbesartan	chem
【PRE_E】
irbesartan	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Irbesartan may have antiatherosclerotic properties beyond those expected from blood pressure lowering per se : this AT1 - blocker decreases the vascular oxidative stress and prevents the procoagulant as well as the pro - inflammatory effects of angiotensin II .
【GOLD_E】
AT1	geneY
angiotensinII	geneY
Irbesartan	chem
angiotensinII	chem
【PRE_E】
Irbesartan	chem
AT1	geneY
angiotensinII	geneY

Irbesartan	AT1	C4
【PRE_R】
Irbesartan	AT1	C4

Irbesartan given alone or in combination with a diuretic therefore represents a rational approach to treat hypertensive patients .

We compared the binding affinity and antagonist potency of 12 clinically used beta - blockers against the cyclic AMP - enhancing effects of ( - ) - isoprenaline and ( - ) - CGP12177 . ( - ) - [ ( 3 ) H ] - CGP12177 bound to a high affinity site ( H ; K ( H ) = 0.47 nM ) and low affinity site ( L ) ; K ( L ) = 235 nM ) .

Caffeine as a psychomotor stimulant : mechanism of action .
【GOLD_E】
Caffeine	chem
【PRE_E】
Caffeine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The popularity of caffeine as a psychoactive drug is due to its stimulant properties , which depend on its ability to reduce adenosine transmission in the brain .
【GOLD_E】
adenosine	chem
caffeine	chem
【PRE_E】
caffeine	chem
adenosine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Adenosine A ( 1 ) and A ( 2A ) receptors are expressed in the basal ganglia , a group of structures involved in various aspects of motor control .
【GOLD_E】
AdenosineA(1)andA(2A)receptors	geneN
Adenosine	chem
【PRE_E】
AdenosineA(1)	geneY
A(2A)	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Caffeine acts as an antagonist to both types of receptors .
【GOLD_E】
Caffeine	chem
【PRE_E】
Caffeine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Increasing evidence indicates that the psychomotor stimulant effect of caffeine is generated by affecting a particular group of projection neurons located in the striatum , the main receiving area of the basal ganglia .
【GOLD_E】
caffeine	chem
【PRE_E】
caffeine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Gallium and other main group metal compounds as antitumor agents .
【GOLD_E】
Gallium	chem
【PRE_E】
Gallium	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Gallium has been the second metal to show activity against malignant tumors in humans soon after the establishment of platinum drugs in routine clinical practice .
【GOLD_E】
Gallium	chem
platinum	chem
【PRE_E】
Gallium	chem
platinum	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It has the unique property of inhibiting tumor growth as a simple cation , mainly because of its close resemblance to ferric iron .
【GOLD_E】
ferriciron	chem
【PRE_E】
ferriciron	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Even though its inability to shift between the trivalent and a divalent oxidation state precludes that gallium behaves as an iron analogue in every respect , it strongly interferes with cellular acquisition of iron from blood by competitive interaction with transferrin and transferrin receptor - mediated endocytosis .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_R】

Apart from the consequences of iron deprivation , gallium exerts cytotoxic effects by direct interaction with the iron - dependent enzyme ribonucleotide reductase , resulting in reduced dNTP pools and inhibition of DNA synthesis .

【PRE_R】

The limitations experienced with gallium nitrate and gallium chloride , which call for a prolonged exposure to low steady - state gallium levels in blood in order to adequately exploit the affinity of gallium to tumor tissues and to avoid severe toxic effects , may be overcome by oral gallium complexes such as tris ( 3 - hydroxy - 2 - methyl - 4H - pyran - 4 - onato ) gallium ( III ) ( gallium maltolate ) or tris ( 8 - quinolinolato ) gallium ( III ) ( KP46 ) , which are currently being evaluated in clinical trials and show promise to initiate a revival of gallium in the clinical setting .

【PRE_E】

【PRE_E】
SV2A	geneY

The novel sensor based on reineckate exchanger shows a stable , potentiometric response for fexofenadine in the concentration range of 1 x 10 ( - 2 ) - 2.5 x 10 ( - 6 ) M at 25 degrees C that is independent of pH in the range of 2.0 - 4.5 .

【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

Thymidylate synthase : a critical target in cancer therapy ?
【GOLD_E】
Thymidylate	chem
Thymidylatesynthase	geneY
【PRE_E】
Thymidylatesynthase	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For the last four decades , synthesis and testing of potentially active drugs ( e.g . , antimetabolites ) have focused on structural modification of existing metabolites as precursors of DNA and RNA synthesis .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In recent years , the focus has shifted to synthesis of target - specific agents .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thus , the current emphasis of drug development is directed at inhibiting specific target ( s ) expressed preferentially , if not exclusively , in tumor tissues , with the ultimate goal of improving the therapeutic efficacy and selectivity of these new agents .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Preclinically , proof - of - principle studies were carried out in tumors with specific expression of the intended target .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

With the hope of translating preclinical findings to the design of implementation of clinical trials .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thymidylate synthase ( TS ) continues to be a critical target for 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) and its prodrugs , UFT / LV ( Orzel ) , capecitabine ( Xeloda ) , and S - 1 , primarily because this enzyme is essential for the synthesis of 2 - deoxythymidine - 5 - monophosphate , a precursor for DNA synthesis .
【GOLD_E】

capecitabine	chem

[ Pharmacological treatment of obesity ] .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The pharmacological treatment of obesity should be considered when can not be achieved a 10 % weight loss with diet therapy and physical activity .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The drugs effective in obesity treatment may act by different mechanisms such as reduction in food intake , inhibition of fat absorption , increase of thermogenesis and stimulation of adipocyte apoptosis .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

At present , we only have two marketed drugs for obesity treatment .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Sibutramine is an inhibitor of norepinephrine , dopamine and serotonina reuptake which inhibits food intake and increases thermogenesis .
【GOLD_E】
Sibutramine	chem
norepinephrine	chem
dopamine	chem
【PRE_E】
Sibutramine	chem
norepinephrine	chem
dopamine	chem
serotonina	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Sibutramine administration for a year can induce a weight loss of 4 - 7 % .
【GOLD_E】
Sibutramine	chem
【PRE_E】
Sibutramine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Its main side effects are hypertension , headache , insomnia and constipation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Orlistat is an inhibitor of pancreatic lipase which is able to block the absorption of 30 % of ingested fat .
【GOLD_E】
pancreaticlipase	geneN
Orlistat	chem
【PRE_E】
Orlistat	chem
pancreaticlipase	geneY
【GOLD_R】

【PRE_R】

Its administration induces weight loss and reduction of ulterior weight regain .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Also , this drug improves hypertension dyslipdaemia and helps to prevent diabetes in 52 % of cases when administered over four years .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The increase in frequency of stools and interference with vitamin absorption are its main side effects .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
vitamin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Glucagon - like peptide 1 , which increases insulin sensitivity and satiety , adiponectin and PPAR - gamma agonists which reduce insulin resistance and modulates adipocyte generation are the basis for future therapeutic approaches of obesity .
【GOLD_E】

Sandwich - cultured rat hepatocytes maintain functional sodium taurocholate co - transporting polypeptide and Bsep transport proteins , and may be useful to study inhibition of transport by xenobiotics at concentrations below the lowest observable adverse effect level ( LOAEL ) .
【GOLD_E】

sodiumtaurocholate	chem
【PRE_E】

LOAEL	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The purpose of this study was to compare viability assessments determined with the neutral red , lactate dehydrogenase ( LDH ) , alamar blue , 3 - [ 4,5 - dimethylthiazol - 2 - yl ] - 2,5 - diphenyltetrazolium bromide ( MTT ) and propidium iodide assays in sandwich - cultured rat hepatocytes following exposure to xenobiotics known to inhibit Bsep , and to define the LOAEL for these xenobiotics in this system .

The discovery of a second isoform of cyclooxygenase ( COX ) led to the search for compounds that could selectively inhibit COX - 2 in humans while sparing prostaglandin formation from COX - 1 .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_R】

We report here the pharmacological properties of a third selective COX - 2 inhibitor , valdecoxib , which is the most potent and in vitro selective of the marketed COX - 2 inhibitors that we have studied .

Recombinant human COX - 1 and COX - 2 were used to screen for new highly potent and in vitro selective COX - 2 inhibitors and compare kinetic mechanisms of binding and enzyme inhibition with other COX inhibitors .

Valdecoxib potently inhibits recombinant COX - 2 , with an IC ( 50 ) of 0.005 microM ; this compares with IC values of 0.05 microM for celecoxib , 0.5 microM for rofecoxib , and 5 microM for etoricoxib .

Unique binding interactions of valdecoxib with COX - 2 translate into a fast rate of inactivation of COX - 2 ( 110,000 M / s compared with 7000 M / s for rofecoxib and 80 M / s for etoricoxib ) .

COX-2	etoricoxib	C4

The overall saturation binding affinity for COX - 2 of valdecoxib is 2.6 nM ( compared with 1.6 nM for celecoxib , 51 nM for rofecoxib , and 260 nM for etoricoxib ) , with a slow off - rate ( t ( 1 / 2 ) approximately 98 min ) .
【GOLD_E】

Pharmacogenetic differences in response to albuterol between Puerto Ricans and Mexicans with asthma .
【GOLD_E】
albuterol	chem
【PRE_E】
albuterol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

BACKGROUND : In the United States , Puerto Ricans and Mexicans have the highest and lowest asthma prevalence , morbidity , and mortality , respectively .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Ethnic - specific differences in the response to drug treatment may contribute to differences in disease outcomes .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Genetic variants at the beta ( 2 ) - adrenergic receptor ( beta ( 2 ) AR ) may modify asthma severity and albuterol responsiveness .
【GOLD_E】
beta(2)-adrenergicreceptor	geneY

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We tested the association of beta ( 2 ) AR genotypes with asthma severity and bronchodilator response to albuterol in Puerto Ricans and Mexicans with asthma .
【GOLD_E】
beta(2)AR	geneY
albuterol	chem
【PRE_E】

albuterol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

METHODS : We used both family - based and cross - sectional tests of association with 8 beta ( 2 ) AR single nucleotide polymorphisms in 684 Puerto Rican and Mexican families .

nucleotide	chem
【PRE_E】
AR	geneY
nucleotide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Regression analyses were used to determine the interaction between genotype , asthma severity , and bronchodilator drug responsiveness .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : Among Puerto Ricans with asthma , the arginine ( Arg ) 16 allele was associated with greater bronchodilator response using both family - based and cross - sectional tests ( p = 0.00001 - 0.01 ) .
【GOLD_E】
arginine	chem
Arg	chem
【PRE_E】
arginine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We found a strong interaction of baseline FEV ( 1 ) with the Arg16Glycine ( Gly ) polymorphism in predicting bronchodilator response .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
FEV(1)	chem
Arg16Glycine	chem

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Among Puerto Ricans with asthma with baseline FEV ( 1 ) < 80 % of predicted , but not in those with FEV ( 1 ) > 80 % , there was a very strong association between the Arg16 genotype and greater bronchodilator responsiveness .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
FEV(1)	geneY

【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSIONS : Ethnic - specific pharmacogenetic differences exist between Arg16Gly genotypes , asthma severity , and bronchodilator response in Puerto Ricans and Mexicans with asthma .

Arg16Gly	geneN

A new coumarinolignoid 8 ' - epi - cleomiscosin A ( 1 ) together with the new glycoside 8 - O - beta - D - glucopyranosyl - 6 - hydroxy - 2 - methyl - 4H - 1 - benzopyrane - 4 - one ( 2 ) have been isolated from the aerial parts of Rhododendron collettianum and their structures determined on the basis of spectroscopic evidences .

Denufosol tetrasodium ( INS37217 ) is a selective P2Y ( 2 ) agonist that stimulates ciliary beat frequency and Cl ( - ) secretion in normal and cystic fibrosis ( CF ) airway epithelia , and is being investigated as an inhaled treatment for CF .

The study was a double - blind , placebo - controlled , multicenter comparison of ascending single doses of denufosol ( 10 , 20 , 40 , and 60 mg , administered by inhalation via the Pari LC Star nebulizer ) vs. placebo ( normal saline ) , followed by a comparison of twice - daily administration of the maximum tolerated dose ( MTD ) of denufosol or placebo for 5 days .

denufosol	chem

【PRE_E】
denufosol	chem
denufosol	chem

A novel method employing high - performance liquid chromatograph - mass spectrometry ( LC - MS ) has been developed and validated for the quantitation of plasma 2 ' - deoxyuridine ( UdR ) .
【GOLD_E】
UdR	chem
2'-deoxyuridine	chem
【PRE_E】
2'-deoxyuridine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It involves a plasma clean - up step with strong anion - exchange solid - phase extraction ( SAX - SPE ) followed by HPLC separation and atmospheric pressure chemical ionization mass spectrometry detection ( APCI - MS ) in a selected - ion monitoring ( SIM ) mode .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The ionization conditions were optimised in negative ion mode to give the best intensity of the dominant formate adduct [ M + HCOO ] - at m / z 273 .

formate	chem
HCOO	chem
【PRE_E】

M+HCOO	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

Imatinib resistance in gastrointestinal stromal tumors .
【GOLD_E】
Imatinib	chem
【PRE_E】
Imatinib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Conventional chemotherapeutic drugs are ineffective in treatment of gastrointestinal stromal tumors ( GISTs ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Imatinib ( STI571 , Gleevec , Glivec ; Novartis Pharmaceuticals , East Hanover , NJ ) , a selective inhibitor of KIT , ABL , BCR - ABL , PDGFRA , and PDGFRB , represents a new paradigm of targeted cancer therapy and has revolutionized the treatment of patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia and GISTs .

【GOLD_E】

nicotinate	chem
【PRE_E】
H(+)	chem
nicotinate	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The [ ( 3 ) H ] nicotinate transport in rat astrocytes increased up to a pH 5.5 .
【GOLD_E】
[(3)H]nicotinate	chem
【PRE_E】
[(3)H]nicotinate	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The nicotinic acid uptake at pH 6.0 was both energy - dependent and saturable with a Michaelis constant ( K ( t ) ) of 2.8 + / - 0.4 mM and the maximal uptake rate ( V ( max ) ) of 31 + / - 3.2 nmol / mg protein / 10 min .
【GOLD_E】
nicotinicacid	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotinicacid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This process was reduced by a protonophore , carbonylcyanide p - trifluoromethoxyphenylhydrazone , and a typical monocarboxylate transporter ( MCT ) inhibitor , alpha - cyano - 4 - hydroxycinnamic acid , suggesting that nicotinate uptake by rat astrocytes is mediated by H ( + ) - coupled monocarboxylate transport system .
【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_E】

imiglucerase	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

More than 3,500 patients worldwide have received ERT with well - documented beneficial effects on the hematological , visceral , skeletal , and pulmonary manifestations , and with resultant improvement in health - related quality of life .

Miglustat , an imino sugar that reversibly inhibits glucosylceramide synthase and reduces intracellular substrate burden , is an oral treatment for patients with type 1 GD that was recently approved in the United States for symptomatic patients with mild to moderate clinical manifestations for whom ERT is not an option .

iminosugar	ERT	C4

Because responses to miglustat are slower and less robust than those observed with ERT , and because miglustat is associated with significant side effects , clinicians who care for patients with GD should become familiar with the limited indications for miglustat use and the circumstances when it may be prescribed appropriately .
【GOLD_E】

The main goal of the present study was to analyse the effects of ( + / - ) - huprine X ( ( + / - ) - HX ) and galantamine ( GAL ) , with potentiating action on nicotinic receptors , and huperzine A ( HPA ) , devoid of nicotinic activity , on [ 3H ] - acetylcholine ( [ 3H ] - ACh ) release in striatal slices of rat brain .

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_R】

Dacarbazine remains the only `` standard `` agent .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These results indicate that the ATPase activity of the secretory granule Atp8a1 is activated by phospholipids binding to a specific site whose properties ( PS selectivity , dependence upon glycerol but not serine , stereochemistry , and vanadate sensitivity ) are similar to , but distinct from , the properties of the substrate binding site of the plasma membrane flippase .

Epratuzumab is a humanized anti - CD22 monoclonal antibody currently in clinical trials for treatment of non - Hodgkin lymphoma ( NHL ) and certain autoimmune diseases .

【PRE_E】

Epratuzumab and rituximab displayed very distinct modes of action ; epratuzumab acts as an immunomodulatory agent , while rituximab is an acutely cytotoxic therapeutic antibody .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
Epratuzumab	chem
epratuzumab	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
Epratuzumab	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For example , rituximab + anti - human IgG Fcgamma yielded marked inhibition of proliferation in human NHL cell lines , while epratuzumab had little or no effect in this assay .

【PRE_E】

In fact , the combination is more effective than rituximab alone in inhibiting proliferation of Daudi Burkitt lymphoma cells in the presence of second antibody , and at least equally effective to rituximab in the absence of crosslinking .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These observations suggest that it may be possible to enhance clinical efficacy by combination therapy comprised of anti - CD20 and anti - CD22 mAbs .

Vasopressin antagonists as aquaretic agents for the treatment of hyponatremia .
【GOLD_E】
Vasopressin	chem
Vasopressin	geneY
【PRE_E】
Vasopressin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Hyponatremia is the most frequent electrolyte disorder encountered in hospitalized patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It is a state of relative water excess due to stimulated arginine vasopressin ( AVP ) and fluid intake greater than obligatory losses .
【GOLD_E】
AVP	chem
argininevasopressin	geneY
AVP	geneY
argininevasopressin	chem
【PRE_E】
argininevasopressin	geneY
AVP	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This kind of hyponatremia occurs in the syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion , congestive heart failure , and liver cirrhosis .
【GOLD_E】
antidiuretichormone	geneY
【PRE_E】
antidiuretichormone	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Fluid restriction is the presently recommended treatment for hyponatremia .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , fluid restriction may be very difficult for patients to achieve , is slow to work , and does not allow a graded therapeutic approach .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

More efficient and specific treatments of hyponatremia are needed .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In this respect , pharmacologic research has yielded a number of compounds exhibiting antagonistic qualities at the vasopressin V2 receptor .
【GOLD_E】
vasopressin	chem
vasopressinV2receptor	geneY
【PRE_E】
vasopressinV2receptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Among these agents , peptidic derivatives of AVP turned out to have intrinsic antidiuretic properties in vivo when given over days or weeks .
【GOLD_E】
AVP	chem
AVP	geneY
【PRE_E】
AVP	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The development of such agents for use in patients has not been pursued .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , several promising nonpeptide , vasopressin receptor antagonists have been described ; these agents are VPA - 985 ( lixivaptan ) , YM - 087 ( conivaptan ) , OPC - 41061 ( tolvaptan ) , and SR - 121463 .
【GOLD_E】
vasopressinreceptor	geneN

Prospective , randomized , placebo - controlled trials performed with these agents found that they corrected hyponatremia efficiently and safely .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Most of the studies were conducted over a 4 - to 28 - day period .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Long - term studies will be needed in the future to address such issues as the eventual benefit to patients and the effects of vasopressin antagonists on morbidity and mortality of patients with hyponatremia .

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
D2receptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recently , many research groups have reported on the positive relationship between the genetic variations in the DRD2 gene and the therapeutic response in schizophrenia patients as a result of the role of variations in the receptor in modulating receptor expression .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
DRD2	geneY
【GOLD_R】

Harlequin ichthyosis ( HI ) is the most severe form of autosomal - recessive , congenital ichthyosis .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Affected infants have markedly impaired barrier function and are more susceptible to infection .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Abnormalities in the localization of epidermal lipids as well as abnormal lamellar granule formation are features of HI skin .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Previously , we and others have shown that mutations in the ABCA12 gene encoding an adenosine triphosphate - binding cassette ( ABC ) transporter underlie the skin disease HI .
【GOLD_E】

Different kinds of mycoses , especially invasive , have become an important public health problem as their incidence has increased dramatically in the last decades in relation to AIDS , hematological malignancies , transplant recipients and other immunosuppressed individuals .

【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】

Ramelteon : a novel hypnotic lacking abuse liability and sedative adverse effects .
【GOLD_E】
Ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
Ramelteon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONTEXT : Ramelteon is a novel MT1 and MT2 melatonin receptor selective agonist recently approved for insomnia treatment .
【GOLD_E】
Ramelteon	chem

MT2melatoninreceptor	geneY
【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】

【PRE_R】
Ramelteon	MT1andMT2melatoninreceptor	C5

Most approved insomnia medications have potential for abuse and cause motor and cognitive impairment .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

OBJECTIVE : To evaluate the potential for abuse , subjective effects , and motor and cognitive - impairing effects of ramelteon compared with triazolam , a classic benzodiazepine sedative - hypnotic drug .
【GOLD_E】
ramelteon	chem
triazolam	chem
benzodiazepine	chem
【PRE_E】
ramelteon	chem
triazolam	chem
benzodiazepine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

DESIGN : In this double - blind crossover study , each participant received oral doses of ramelteon ( 16 , 80 , or 160 mg ) , triazolam ( 0.25 , 0.5 , or 0.75 mg ) , and placebo during approximately 18 days .
【GOLD_E】
triazolam	chem
ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
ramelteon	chem
triazolam	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

All participants received each treatment on different days .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Most outcome measures were assessed at 0.5 hours before drug administration and repeatedly up to 24 hours after drug administration .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

SETTING : Residential research facility .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

PARTICIPANTS : Fourteen adults with histories of sedative abuse .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

MAIN OUTCOME MEASURES : Subject - rated measures included items relevant to potential for abuse ( eg , drug liking , street value , and pharmacological classification ) , as well as assessments of a broad range of stimulant and sedative subjective effects .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Observer - rated measures included assessments of sedation and impairment .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Motor and cognitive performance measures included psychomotor and memory tasks and a standing balance task .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : Compared with placebo , ramelteon ( 16 , 80 , and 160 mg ) showed no significant effect on any of the subjective effect measures , including those related to potential for abuse .
【GOLD_E】
ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
ramelteon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the pharmacological classification , 79 % ( 11 / 14 ) of subjects identified the highest dose of ramelteon as placebo .
【GOLD_E】
ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
ramelteon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Similarly , compared with placebo , ramelteon had no effect at any dose on any observer - rated or motor and cognitive performance measure .
【GOLD_E】
ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
ramelteon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In contrast , triazolam showed dose - related effects on a wide range of subject - rated , observer - rated , and motor and cognitive performance measures , consistent with its profile as a sedative drug with abuse liability .
【GOLD_E】
triazolam	chem
【PRE_E】
triazolam	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSION : Ramelteon demonstrated no significant effects indicative of potential for abuse or motor and cognitive impairment at up to 20 times the recommended therapeutic dose and may represent a useful alternative to existing insomnia medications .
【GOLD_E】
Ramelteon	chem
【PRE_E】
Ramelteon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Interaction of nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( NSAID ) with Helicobacter pylori in the stomach of humans and experimental animals .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Helicobacter pylori ( H. pylori ) and non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( NSAID ) are major pathogenic factors in peptic ulcer disease but whether these two factors exert synergistic or antagonistic action on the gastric mucosa has been a subject of controversy .
【GOLD_E】
steroidal	chem
【PRE_E】
steroidal	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The classic concept states that there is an increased ulcer occurrence and bleeding in patients with both H. pylori infection and NSAID use .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , the question whether the H. pylori eradication therapy in NSAID users reduces the occurrence of peptic ulcer has not been fully addressed .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Studies on secondary prevention of NSAID - associated ulcers in H. pylori patients have indicated that H. pylori eradication results in impaired ulcer healing with an effect on the rate of peptic ulcer occurrence .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

On the other hand , the treatment of H. pylori in patients with no prior history of chronic NSAID therapy has been shown to decrease the risk of peptic ulcer .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Studies in experimental animals revealed for instance , that the H. pylori infection augments the gastric mucosal damage induced by NSAID in Mongolian gerbils .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In rats with preexisting chromic gastric ulcers , H. pylori infection attenuated significantly the aspirin - induced inhibition of ulcer healing and accompanying fall in the gastric blood flow at the margin of these ulcers , suggesting negative interaction between aspirin and H. pylori on ulcerogenesis .
【GOLD_E】
aspirin	chem
aspirin	chem
【PRE_E】
aspirin	chem
aspirin	chem
ulcerogenesis	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Accumulated evidence in humans and animals shows that both aspirin and H. pylori upregulate the expression of cyclooxygenase ( COX ) - 2 both at mRNA and protein levels at the ulcer margin , but failed to influence significantly that of COX - 1 .
【GOLD_E】
aspirin	chem
cyclooxygenase(COX)-2	geneN

【PRE_E】

It was , therefore , proposed that H. pylori may in fact , antagonize , aspirin - induced delay of ulcer healing due to suppression of acid secretion by the enhancement in PGE ( 2 ) possibly derived from COX - 2 expression and activity and to the overexpression of growth factors such as TGF alpha and VEGF .

In conscious spontaneously hypertensive rats , carvedilol ( 0.03 - 3.0 mg / kg , iv ) produced a dose - dependent reduction in blood pressure with no significant effect on heart rate .
【GOLD_E】
carvedilol	chem
【PRE_E】
carvedilol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

carvedilol	chem
【PRE_E】
carvedilol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

carvedilol	chem
【PRE_E】
carvedilol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_R】

In anesthetized spontaneously hypertensive rats , the antihypertensive activity of carvedilol was nearly abolished by combined pretreatment of the rats with high doses of the alpha 1 adrenoceptor antagonist , prazosin ( 1 mg / kg , iv ) , and the nonselective beta adrenoceptor antagonist , propranolol ( 3 mg / kg , iv ) , suggesting that the majority of the antihypertensive response produced by carvedilol may be accounted for by blockade of beta and alpha 1 adrenoceptors .

BACKGROUND : Hypertension treatment guidelines recommend combination therapy with diuretics and other antihypertensive agents , including angiotensin II type 1 ( AT1 ) receptor antagonists .
【GOLD_E】
angiotensinIItype1(AT1)receptor	geneY
angiotensinII	chem
【PRE_E】
angiotensinIItype1(AT1)receptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This trial investigated the possibility of pharmacokinetic interactions between the AT1 receptor antagonist olmesartan medoxomil and the thiazide diuretic hydrochlorothiazide in healthy subjects .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
thiazide	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem

【GOLD_R】
olmesartanmedoxomil	AT1receptor	C6
【PRE_R】
AT1	olmesartan	C6
AT1	medoxomil	C6
AT1	thiazide	C6

METHODS : Twenty - four healthy normotensive adult male subjects underwent three consecutive 7 - day treatment periods ( A , B and C , respectively ) during which they were randomised to receive : olmesartan medoxomil 20 mg once daily ( regimen A ) , hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg once daily ( regimen B ) , or olmesartan medoxomil 20 mg once daily plus hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg once daily ( regimen C ) .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
olmesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Treatment periods were separated by washouts of 7 - 14 days .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The primary pharmacokinetic parameters evaluated were : the area under the plasma concentration versus time curve at steady state ( AUCss , tau ) , the maximum plasma concentration at steady state ( Css , max ) , and the time at which Css , max occurred ( tmax ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : Complete data sets from 17 subjects were available for pharmacokinetic analyses .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Mean concentration versus time profiles were similar for monotherapy and combination treatment for both olmesartan ( the active metabolite of olmesartan medoxomil ) and hydrochlorothiazide .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartan	chem
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartan	chem
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For olmesartan , comparison of monotherapy with combination therapy showed that for AUCss , tau and Css , max point estimates were close to unity , demonstrating bioequivalence .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartan	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartan	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For hydrochlorothiazide , combination therapy resulted in decreases in AUCss , tau and Css , max of approximately 10 % versus monotherapy ; nevertheless , since 90 % CIs were within the acceptance range , bioequivalence was proven .
【GOLD_E】
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Median tmax values for olmesartan and hydrochlorothiazide for periods A , B and C were identical , indicating bioequivalence .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartan	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Both olmesartan medoxomil and hydrochlorothiazide were well tolerated .
【GOLD_E】
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSION : These results show that there is little or no potential for a clinically relevant pharmacokinetic interaction between olmesartan medoxomil 20 mg and hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg , and therefore dosage adjustment should not be necessary when they are co - administered .
【GOLD_E】
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【PRE_E】
olmesartanmedoxomil	chem
hydrochlorothiazide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In vitro , cromolyn ( 100 microM ) inhibited S100P - stimulated Panc - 1 cell proliferation ( S100P , mean = 0.93 U , versus S100P + cromolyn , mean = 0.56 U , difference = 0.37 U ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] = 0.24 to 0.49 U ; P = .001 , n = 3 ) , invasion ( S100P , mean = 58.0 % , versus S100P + cromolyn , mean = 9.4 % , difference = 48.6 % ; 95 % CI = 38.8 % to 58.8 % ; P < .001 , n = 3 ) , and NFkappaB activity ( S100P , mean = 14,460 , versus S100P + cromolyn , mean = 7360 photons / s , difference = 7100 photons / s ; 95 % CI = 3689 to 10 510 photons / s ; P = .005 , n = 3 ) .

Genetic polymorphisms in the cyclooxygenase - 2 gene , use of nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs , and breast cancer risk .
【GOLD_E】
cyclooxygenase-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
cyclooxygenase-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

INTRODUCTION : The association between use of nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( NSAIDs ) and breast cancer risk remains unclear .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Inconsistencies in previously reported findings may be partly due to differences in expression of cyclooxygenase ( COX ) - 2 .
【GOLD_E】
cyclooxygenase(COX)-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
cyclooxygenase(COX)-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We hypothesized that genetic polymorphisms ( COX - 2 .926 , COX - 2 .5209 , and COX - 2 .8473 ) may reduce overall breast cancer risk or risk for subtypes of breast cancer by modulating the inflammatory response and may interact with aspirin or any NSAID use .
【GOLD_E】
COX-2	geneY
COX-2	geneY
COX-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
COX-2	geneY
COX-2	geneY
COX-2	geneY
aspirin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

METHODS : We conducted a population - based , case - control study in which we genotyped 1,067 breast cancer cases and 1,110 control individuals included in the Long Island Breast Cancer Study Project .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : No major effects of the three COX - 2 variant alleles on breast cancer risk were found .
【GOLD_E】
COX-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
COX-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A total of eight distinct haplotypes and 18 diplotypes were observed in the population .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Overall , no significant associations between COX - 2 haplotypes / diplotypes and breast cancer risk were observed .
【GOLD_E】
COX-2	geneN
【PRE_E】
COX-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Among women who used aspirin or any NSAID there was little evidence for an interaction with the at - risk COX - 2 genotypes , with one exception .
【GOLD_E】
COX-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
aspirin	chem
COX-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Among women with hormone receptor positive breast cancer , the reduced risk for any NSAID use was only evident among those who had at least one variant C allele of COX - 2 .8473 ( odds ratio = 0.7 , 95 % confidence interval = 0.5 to 1.0 ; P for the interaction = 0.02 ) .
【GOLD_E】
COX-2	geneY
【PRE_E】
hormonereceptor	geneN
COX-2	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

There was no corresponding interaction for aspirin use , possibly because of limited power .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
aspirin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSION : These data provide modest evidence that the C allele of COX - 2 .8473 may interact with NSAIDs to reduce risk for hormone receptor positive breast cancer .

【GOLD_E】

triflusal	chem
aspirin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

BACKGROUND AND OBJECTIVES : Activated tyrosine kinases are implicated in the pathogenesis of chronic and acute leukemia , and represent attractive targets for therapy .

【PRE_R】

Sorafenib ( BAY43 - 9006 , Nexavar ) is a small molecule B - RAF inhibitor that is used for the treatment of renal cell carcinoma , and has been shown to have activity against receptor tyrosine kinases from the platelet - derived growth factor receptor ( PDGFR ) and vascular endothelial growth factor receptor ( VEGFR ) families .

【PRE_E】
Salicylate	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
aspirin	chem

【PRE_R】
