【PRE_R】

Effects of silver nanoparticles on the liver and hepatocytes in vitro .
【GOLD_E】
silver	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

With the increasing use and incorporation of nanoparticles ( NPs ) into consumer products , screening for potential toxicity is necessary to ensure customer safety .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

NPs have been shown to translocate to the bloodstream following inhalation and ingestion , and such studies demonstrate that the liver is an important organ for accumulation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Silver ( Ag ) NPs are highly relevant for human exposure due to their use in food contact materials , dietary supplements , and antibacterial wound treatments .
【GOLD_E】
Silver	chem
Ag	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Due to the large number of different NPs already used in various products and being developed for new applications , it is essential that relevant , quick , and cheap methods of in vitro risk assessment suitable for these new materials are established .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Therefore , this study used a simple hepatocytes model combined with an in vivo injection model to simulate the passage of a small amount of NPs into the bloodstream following exposure , e.g . , via ingestion or inhalation , and examined the potential of Ag NPs of 20 nm diameter to cause toxicity , inflammation , and oxidative stress in the liver following in vivo exposures of female Wistar rats via iv injection to 50 μg of NPs and in vitro exposures using the human hepatocyte cell line C3A .
【GOLD_E】
Ag	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We found that Ag NPs were highly cytotoxic to hepatocytes ( LC ( 50 ) lactate dehydrogenase : 2.5 μg / cm ( 2 ) ) and affected hepatocyte homeostasis by reducing albumin release .
【GOLD_E】
lactatedehydrogenase	geneN
albumin	geneY

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although the presence and distribution of polychlorinated biphenyls ( PCBs ) in Arctic marine environments has been well documented , the implications for the health of biota are poorly understood .
【GOLD_E】
polychlorinatedbiphenyls	chem
PCBs	chem
【PRE_E】
polychlorinatedbiphenyls	chem
PCBs	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the present study , multiple lines of evidence , including site - specific effects data , were used to assess PCB - related risks to marine biota at a contaminated military site in Saglek Bay , Labrador , Canada , from 1997 to 1999 .
【GOLD_E】
PCB	chem
【PRE_E】
PCB	chem
1997	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Risks were evaluated for three components of the ecosystem : benthic invertebrates , a bottom - feeding fish ( shorthorn sculpin , Myoxocephalus scorpius ) , and a diving seabird ( black guillemot , Cepphus grylle ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Average sediment PCB concentrations exceeded the Canadian interim sediment quality guideline level by 41 - fold .
【GOLD_E】
PCB	chem
【PRE_E】
PCB	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , sediment toxicity testing and a benthic community survey showed no evidence of adverse effects .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In contrast , shorthorn sculpin and black guillemot PCB exposures ( measured as sum of 55 congeners ) were elevated enough to pose risks to survival or reproduction .
【GOLD_E】
PCB	chem
【PRE_E】
PCB	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Based on the collective evidence , the authors estimated that risks were posed by sediment PCB concentrations greater than 77 ng / g dry weight for black guillemots and 750 ng / g dry weight for shorthorn sculpins .
【GOLD_E】
PCB	chem
【PRE_E】
PCB	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The present study , along with two parallel studies , provided information to support the management decisions concerning potential remedial action on the contaminated sediments .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This ecological risk assessment describes the steps and rationale taken to evaluate the risk posed by an area of PCB - contaminated marine sediments in an otherwise relatively pristine northern coastal environment .

【PRE_E】

The scintigraphic evaluation and genetic correlation of joint involvements in pediatric patients with familial Mediterranean fever .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Purpose : We aimed to evaluate the articular involvements in pediatric patients with familial Mediterranean fever ( FMF ) with joint symptoms by bone scintigraphy and to correlate the involved joints with the gene mutations .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Materials and methods : A total of 41 newly diagnosed patients in pediatric age group ( 28 girls and 13 boys ; mean age 9.14 ± 2.91 years ) with joint involvement symptoms were included in this study .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Scintigraphic images were obtained at 5th min ( blood pool or early phase ) and starting at 3 h ( late phase ) after ( after tracer injection ) intravenous administration of technetium - 99m ( 99mTc ) - methylendiphosphonate ( MDP ) .
【GOLD_E】
technetium-99m	chem
99mTc	chem
methylendiphosphonate	chem
MDP	chem
【PRE_E】
technetium-99m(99mTc)-methylendiphosphonate	chem
MDP	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Genomic DNA was isolated from leukocytes using standard salting out procedure .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The sequencing data were analyzed .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Results : Of the 41 patients , arthritis was found in 21 ( 51.2 % ) patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Of the 21 patients , there was single joint involvement in 15 ( 71.4 % ) patients and multiple joint involvement in six ( 28.6 % ) patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The mean age of patients with joint involvement ( 8 ± 2.3 years ) were considerably lower than the patients without joint involvement ( 10.35 ± 3.04 years ) , and this was statistically significant ( p = 0.008 ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The most commonly involved joints were ankles and knees .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Multiple joint involvements were most frequently observed in the M694V and M694I gene mutations ( 16.7 % ) .
【GOLD_E】
M694V	geneN
M694I	geneN
【PRE_E】
M694V	geneY
M694I	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Conclusions : We use and recommend the bone scintigraphy in patients with FMF to determine the presence and distribution of arthritis , since bone scintigraphy is inexpensive , noninvasive , easy - to - use , and also is more sensitive in the diagnosis and distribution of arthritis than conventional radiological methods and clinical examination .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

1 . The interactions between herbal dietary supplements and therapeutic drugs have emerged as an important issue and P - glycoprotein ( P - gp ) has been reported as one of the significant factors of these interactions .

3 . To determine the plasma levels of risperidone and 9 - hydroxyrisperidone in rats , a HPLC method was developed using a liquid - liquid acid back extraction .
【GOLD_E】
isperidonea	chem
-hydroxyrisperidonei	chem
【PRE_E】
risperidone	chem
9-hydroxyrisperidone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

When risperidone ( 6 mg / kg ) was co - administered with silymarin ( 40 mg / kg ) to rats orally , the C ( max ) of 9 - hydroxyrisperidone was significantly increased to1.3 - fold ( p < 0.05 ) , while the other pharmacokinetic parameters did not show any significant differences .
【GOLD_E】
risperidone	chem
hydroxyrisperidonewa	chem
【PRE_E】
risperidone	chem
silymarin	chem
9-hydroxyrisperidone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Expanding the experiment where rats were repeatedly administered with silymarin for 5 days prior to giving risperidone , the C ( max ) of risperidone and 9 - hydroxyrisperidone were significantly increased to 2.4 - fold ( p < 0.001 ) and 1.7 - fold ( p < 0.001 ) , respectively , and the AUC ( 0 - t ) , as well to 1.7 - fold ( p < 0.05 ) and 2.1 - fold ( p < 0.01 ) , respectively .
【GOLD_E】
risperidone	chem
risperidone	chem
9-hydroxyrisperidone	chem
【PRE_E】
silymarin	chem
risperidone	chem
risperidone	chem
9-hydroxyrisperidone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Design , synthesis and structure - activity relationship of new arginine vasopressin analogues containing proline derivatives in position 2 .
【GOLD_E】
proline	chem
argininevasopressin	chem
argininevasopressin	geneY
【PRE_E】
argininevasopressin	geneY
proline	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In this study , we present the synthesis and pharmacological properties of new analogues of arginine vasopressin modified in the N - terminal part of the molecule with proline derivatives : indoline - 2 - carboxylic acid ( Ica ) and ( 2S,4R ) - 4 - ( naphthalene - 2 - ylmethyl ) pyrrolidine - 2 - carboxylic acid .
【GOLD_E】
argininevasopressin	chem
argininevasopressin	geneY

【PRE_E】
argininevasopressin	geneY

proline	chem
indoline-2-carboxylicacid	chem

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

All the peptides were tested for pressor , antidiuretic and in vitro uterotonic activities .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
antidiuretic	chem

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
humanoxytocinreceptor	geneY

【PRE_E】
humanoxytocinreceptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The Ica ( 2 ) substitution resulted in two moderately potent and selective antioxytocic agents : [ Mpa ( 1 ) , Ica ( 2 ) , D - Arg ( 8 ) ] VP and [ Mpa ( 1 ) , Ica ( 2 ) , Val ( 4 ) , D - Arg ( 8 ) ] VP ( pA ( 2 ) = 7.09 and 7.50 , respectively ) .
【GOLD_E】
Ica	chem
[Mpa(1),Ica(2),D-Arg(8)]VP	chem

【PRE_E】

antioxytocic	chem
D-Arg(8)]VP	chem
Val	chem
D-Arg(8)]VP	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

On the other hand , peptides modified with ( 2S,4R ) - 4 - ( naphthalene - 2 - ylmethyl ) pyrrolidine - 2 - carboxylic acid , apart from their moderate antioxytocic activity , turned out to be weak antagonists of the pressor response to arginine vasopressin .

The results of this study provide useful information about the structure - activity relationship of arginine vasopressin analogues and can help to design compounds with desired biological properties .

The aim of the present work was to evaluate the effectiveness of such an antidote by testing whether doxorubicin ( DOX ) , a known P - gp inducer , could efficiently protect Caco - 2 cells against PQ cytotoxicity , 6 h after the incubation with the herbicide , reflecting a real - life intoxication scenario .

【PRE_E】

Selective separation of similarly sized proteins with tunable nanoporous block copolymer membranes .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

An integral asymmetric membrane was fabricated in a fast and one - step process by combining the self - assembly of an amphiphilic block copolymer ( PS - b - P4VP ) with nonsolvent - induced phase separation .
【GOLD_E】
PS-b-P4VP	chem
【PRE_E】
PS-b-P4VP	chem
nonsolvent	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The structure was found to be composed of a thin layer of densely packed highly ordered cylindrical channels with uniform pore sizes perpendicular to the surface on top of a nonordered sponge - like layer .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The as - assembled membrane obtained a water flux of more than 3200 L m ( - 2 ) h ( - 1 ) bar ( - 1 ) , which was at least an order of magnitude higher than the water fluxes of commercially available membranes with comparable pore sizes , making this membrane particularly well suited to size - selective and charge - based separation of biomolecules .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To test the performance of the membrane , we conducted diffusion experiments at the physiological pH of 7.4 using bovine serum albumin ( BSA ) and globulin - γ , two proteins with different diameters but too close in size ( 2 - fold difference in molecular mass ) to be efficiently separated via conventional dialysis membrane processes .
【GOLD_E】
BSA	geneY
globulin-γ	geneN
bovineserumalbumin	geneY
【PRE_E】
bovineserumalbumin	geneY
BSA	geneY
globulin-γ	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The diffusion rate differed by a factor of 87 , the highest value reported to date .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We also analyzed charge - based diffusive transport and separation of two proteins of similar molecular weight ( BSA and bovine hemoglobin ( BHb ) ) through the membrane as a function of external pH .
【GOLD_E】
BSA	geneY
bovinehemoglobin	geneN
BHb	geneN
【PRE_E】

bovinehemoglobin	geneY
BHb	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】
BSA	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We then positively charged the membrane to improve the separation selectivity .

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Metabolic effects of honey in type 1 diabetes mellitus : a randomized crossover pilot study .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The aim of this study was to evaluate the metabolic effects of 12 - week honey consumption on patients suffering from type 1 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This was a randomized crossover clinical trial done in the National Institute for Diabetes and Endocrinology , Cairo , Egypt .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Twenty patients of both sexes aged 4 - 18 years with type 1 DM and HbA1C < 10 % participated in the study .
【GOLD_E】
HbA1C	geneY
【PRE_E】
type1DM	geneY
HbA1C	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

They were randomized into two equal groups ( intervention to control and control to intervention ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The dietary intervention was 12 - week honey consumption in a dose of 0.5 mL / kg body weight per day .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The main outcome measures were serum glucose , lipids , and C - peptide , and anthropometric measurements .
【GOLD_E】
C-peptide	geneY
glucose	chem
【PRE_E】
glucose	chem
C-peptide	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

None of participants were lost in follow - up .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The intervention resulted in significant decreases in subscapular skin fold thickness ( SSFT ; P = .002 ) , fasting serum glucose ( FSG ; P = .001 ) , total cholesterol ( P = .0001 ) , serum triglycerides ( TG ; P = .0001 ) , and low - density lipoprotein ( P = .0009 ) , and significant increases in fasting C - peptide ( FCP ; P = .0004 ) and 2 - h postprandial C - peptide ( PCP ; P = .002 ) .
【GOLD_E】
low-densitylipoprotein	geneN
fastingC-peptide	geneY

cholesterol	chem
triglycerides	chem
FCP	geneY
postprandialC-peptide	geneY

【PRE_E】

cholesterol	chem
triglycerides	chem
low-densitylipoprotein	geneN
C-peptide	geneY
C-peptide	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

As possible long - term effects of honey after its withdrawal , statistically significant reductions in midarm circumference ( P = .000 ) , triceps skin fold thickness ( P = .006 ) , SSFT ( P = .003 ) , FSG ( P = .005 ) , 2 - h postprandial serum glucose ( P = .000 ) , TG ( P = .003 ) , and HbA1C ( P = .043 ) , and significant increases in FCP ( P = .002 ) and PCP ( P = .003 ) were observed .
【GOLD_E】
FCP	geneY

【PRE_E】

HbA1C	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This small clinical trial suggests that long - term consumption of honey might have positive effects on the metabolic derangements of type 1 DM .

In the clinical study , small increases in the AUC ( 0 - inf ) of simvastatin [ mean ratio ( 90 % CI ) of 1.34 ( 1.22 , 1.48 ) ] and rosuvastatin [ mean ratio ( 90 % CI ) of 1.39 ( 1.30 , 1.49 ) ] were observed when co - administered with GSK1292263 , which is consistent with an inhibitory effect on intestinal BCRP and CYP3A4 .

Antioxidants and mucolytics in COPD management : when ( if ever ) and in whom ?
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) is a major cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Oxidative stress is an important mechanism in the pathogenesis of this disease .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The oxidant / antioxidant imbalance occurring in smokers and patients with COPD is well established .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thus , therapeutic strategies targeting oxidative stress with pharmacological antioxidant agents or boosting the endogenous levels of antioxidants is likely to be beneficial as an adjunctive tool in the treatment of COPD patients .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thiol compounts such as N - acetyl - L - cysteine ( NAC ) , carbocysteine , erdosteine , and fudosteine have been extensively studied .
【GOLD_E】
Thiol	chem
N-acetyl-L-cysteine	chem
NAC	chem
carbocysteine	chem
erdosteine	chem
fudosteine	chem
【PRE_E】
Thiol	chem
N-acetyl-L-cysteine	chem
NAC	chem
carbocysteine	chem
erdosteine	chem
fudosteine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although some results remain controversial , NAC and carbocysteine seem to have beneficial effect in patients not receiving inhaled corticosteroids who suffer from frequent exacerbations .
【GOLD_E】
carbocysteine	chem
corticosteroids	chem
NAC	chem
【PRE_E】
NAC	chem
carbocysteine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In addition , other antioxidants like superoxide dismutase ( SOD ) mimetics and nuclear factor - erythroid 2 related factor 2 ( Nrf2 ) are shown to decrease markers of oxidative stress in patients with emphysema , while others like glutathione peroxidase ( GPx ) mimetics and NO synthase ( iNOS ) can prevent both inflammation and oxidative stress in clinical trials in vivo ( or in mouse models ) .
【GOLD_E】
superoxide	chem
glutathioneperoxidase	geneN

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In this article we review the effectiveness of various antioxidant factors in COPD and their potential beneficial effect in the treatment of the disease .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】

Steroid toxicity and detoxification in ascomycetous fungi .
【GOLD_E】
Steroid	chem
【PRE_E】
Steroid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the last couple of decades fungal infections have become a significant clinical problem .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A major interest into fungal steroid action has been provoked since research has proven that steroid hormones are toxic to fungi and affect the host / fungus relationship .
【GOLD_E】
steroid	chem
steroid	chem
【PRE_E】
steroid	chem
steroid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
Steroid	chem
【PRE_E】
Steroid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
steroid	chem
【PRE_E】
steroid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Biotransformation was a relatively slow process as it also depended on the growth phase of the fungus .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In addition to biotransformation , steroid extrusion out of the cells contributed to the lowering of the active intracellular steroid concentration .

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Mismatch repair is also implicated in cell - cycle arrest and apoptosis after DNA damage .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Because yeast and human mismatch repair systems are well conserved , we have employed the budding yeast Saccharomyces cerevisiae to understand the regulation and function of the mismatch repair gene MSH2 .
【GOLD_E】

Inhibitors based on a benzo - fused spirocyclic oxazepine scaffold were discovered for stearoyl - coenzyme A ( CoA ) desaturase 1 ( SCD1 ) and subsequently optimized to potent compounds with favorable pharmacokinetic profiles and in vivo efficacy in reducing the desaturation index in a mouse model .

Initial optimization revealed potency preferences for the oxazepine core and benzylic positions , while substituents on the piperidine portions were more tolerant and allowed for tuning of potency and PK properties .

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , achieving in vivo delivery of siRNA to critical liver cells remains the biggest obstacle for this technique to be a real clinic therapeutic modality .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Here , we describe a promising liver targeting siRNA delivery system based on N - acetylgalactosamine functionalized mixed micellar nanoparticles ( Gal - MNP ) , which can efficiently deliver siRNA to hepatocytes and silence the target gene expression after systemic administration .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Yerba Mate tea ( Mate ) , an infusion made from the leaves of the tree Ilex paraguariensis , is a widely consumed beverage in South America .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This study was performed to investigate the effect of Mate tea on vascular endothelial dysfunction and liver lipoprotein receptor gene expression in hyperlipidemic rats , with the aim of gaining insight into its known lipid - lowering protective mechanisms .
【GOLD_E】
lipoproteinreceptor	geneN
【PRE_E】
liverlipoproteinreceptor	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Sixty male Sprague - Dawley rats were randomly divided into five groups : a normal control group ( NC ) , a high - fat diet group ( HC ) , and three Mate tea - treated groups .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the NC group , rats were fed with standard diet while in the other groups the rats were fed a high - fat diet for 8weeks .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the Mate tea - treated groups , the rats were fed a high - fat diet supplemented with low , moderate or high concentrations of aqueous Mate tea extract for the final 4weeks .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Compared to the HC group , aqueous Mate tea extract significantly reduced endothelin ( ET ) and thromboxane B ( 2 ) ( TXB ( 2 ) ) levels and increased nitric oxide ( NO ) and 6 - keto prostaglandin F ( 1α ) ( 6 - keto - PGF ( 1α ) ) levels in the blood , reduced the pathological damage of vascular endothelial cells , decreased intercellular adhesion molecule - 1 ( ICAM - 1 ) protein expression in the thoracic aorta , and upregulated mRNA expression of hepatic low density lipoprotein receptor ( LDLR ) and scavenger receptor B1 ( SR - B1 ) .

【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_R】

The animals were divided into five groups : group 1 received distilled water and served as control ; group 2 received only aluminium sulphate ( 50 mg / kg body weight ( b.w . ) ) ; group 3 received aluminium sulphate ( 50 mg / kg b.w . ) plus zinc sulphate ( 50 mg / kg b.w . ) ; group 4 received aluminium sulphate ( 50 mg / kg b.w . ) and vitamin E ( 15 mg / kg b.w . ) ; group 5 received aluminium sulphate plus a combination of zinc sulphate and vitamin E in similar doses as above .

Results indicate that AM4054 serves as an effective CB ( 1 ) discriminative stimulus , with an onset and time course of action comparable with that of the CB ( 1 ) agonist Δ ( 9 ) - tetrahydrocannabinol , and that the inverse agonist rimonabant and the neutral antagonist AM4113 produce dose - related rightward shifts in the AM4054 dose - effect curve , indicating that both drugs surmountably antagonize the discriminative stimulus effects of AM4054 .

【PRE_R】

New oral anticoagulants ( OACs ) that directly inhibit Factor Xa ( FXa ) or thrombin have been developed for the long - term prevention of thromboembolic disorders .
【GOLD_E】

OACs	thrombin	C4

These novel agents provide numerous benefits over older vitamin K antagonists ( VKAs ) due to major pharmacological differences .
【GOLD_E】
vitaminK	chem
【PRE_E】
vitaminK	chem
VKAs	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

VKAs are economical and very well characterized , but have important limitations that can outweigh these advantages , such as slow onset of action , narrow therapeutic window and unpredictable anticoagulant effect .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
VKAs	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

VKA - associated dietary precautions , monitoring and dosing adjustments to maintain international normalized ratio ( INR ) within therapeutic range , and bridging therapy , are inconvenient for patients , expensive , and may result in inappropriate use of VKA therapy .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
VKA	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This may lead to increased bleeding risk or reduced anticoagulation and increased risk of thrombotic events .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The new OACs have rapid onset of action , low potential for food and drug interactions , and predictable anticoagulant effect that removes the need for routine monitoring .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
OACs	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

FXa inhibitors , e.g . rivaroxaban and apixaban , are potent , oral direct inhibitors of prothrombinase - bound , clot - associated or free FXa .

Both agents have a rapid onset of action , a wide therapeutic window , little or no interaction with food and other drugs , minimal inter - patient variability , and display similar pharmacokinetics in different patient populations .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Since both are substrates , co - administration of rivaroxaban and apixaban with strong cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) 3A4 and permeability glycoprotein ( P - gp ) inhibitors and inducers can result in substantial changes in plasma concentrations due to altered clearance rates ; consequently , their concomitant use is contraindicated and caution is required when used concomitantly with strong CYP3A4 and P - gp inducers .

Although the new agents are pharmacologically better than VKAs - - particularly in terms of fixed dosing , rapid onset of action , no INR monitoring and lower risk of drug interactions - - there are some differences between them : the bioavailability of dabigatran is lower than rivaroxaban and apixaban , and so the dabigatran dosage required is higher ; lower protein binding of dabigatran reduces the variability related to albuminaemia .

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

The present study was conducted on 80 pesticide male sprayers ( 42 nonsmokers and 38 smokers ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

As the Mg ( 2 + ) ion concentration was increased , there was a consistent decrease of the enzyme catalytic turnover from 0.31 s ( - 1 ) ( 0 μM Mg ( 2 + ) ) to 0.050 s ( - 1 ) ( 6000 μM Mg ( 2 + ) ) and a distinct shift in steady - state conformational population from one that favors the ALDH1 - NADH complex with the shorter fluorescence lifetime ( 33 % excess ) in the absence of magnesium ion to one that favors the ALDH1 - NADH complex with the longer fluorescence lifetime ( 13 % excess ) at 6000 μM Mg ( 2 + ) .

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Acrolein , a ubiquitous dietary pollutant and by - product of oxidative stress , can induce cytotoxicity in neurons , which might play an important role in the etiology of AD .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
MPTP	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Consumption of coffee is associated with reduced risk of Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) , an effect that has largely been attributed to caffeine .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
caffeine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , coffee contains numerous components that may also be neuroprotective .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

One of these compounds is eicosanoyl - 5 - hydroxytryptamide ( EHT ) , which ameliorates the phenotype of α - synuclein transgenic mice associated with decreased protein aggregation and phosphorylation , improved neuronal integrity and reduced neuroinflammation .
【GOLD_E】

Peptides expressing the furan moiety were attached to poly ( ethylene glycol ) ( PEG ) hydrogels through a thermally reversible covalent bond formed by a Diels - Alder reaction .
【GOLD_E】
furan	chem

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Reactions of thiol and maleimide PEG macromers in an off - stoichiometric Michael addition were performed , such that the maleimide moiety was in excess , to create hydrogel networks with pendant Diels - Alder compatible tethering sites , that is , the maleimide .
【GOLD_E】
maleimide	chem
maleimide	chem
thiol	chem
maleimidePEG	chem
【PRE_E】
thiol	chem
maleimidePEG	chem
maleimide	chem
Diels-Alder	chem
maleimide	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

By making use of the Diels - Alder reaction , it was possible to control the release rate of reversibly bound moieties from the hydrogel by changing the temperature ; higher temperatures favor a faster retro - Diels - Alder reaction and , therefore , a faster release from the polymer network .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
Diels-Alder	chem
retro-Diels-Alder	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This concept was demonstrated by incorporating a fluorescently labeled furan - RGDS sequence into a hydrogel possessing excess maleimide functionalities and monitoring the subsequent liberation of RGDS at various temperatures , illustrating a Diels - Alder mediated release mechanism .
【GOLD_E】
furan	chem
maleimide	chem
【PRE_E】
furan-RGDS	chem
maleimide	chem
RGDS	chem
Diels-Alder	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The release profile was quantified at temperatures ranging from physiological ( 37 °C ) to 80 °C .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

By changing the temperature , varying extents of release were attained over the time course of several days , ranging from 40 % release for lower temperatures to complete release for the highest temperature considered .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Further confirmation of a reaction - diffusion controlled release mechanism was obtained through comparison of experimental release data to a reaction - diffusion model of the release .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In addition to thermal modulation , tuning of the release rate was accomplished by altering the number of possible Diels - Alder tethering sites present in the hydrogel .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
Diels-Alder	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Increasing the amount of free maleimide and , therefore , the number of potential Diels - Alder reaction sites , effectively slowed the release of peptide from the polymer .
【GOLD_E】
maleimide	chem
【PRE_E】
maleimide	chem
Diels-Alder	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For instance , doubling the amount of maleimide sites present in the hydrogel system decreased the amount of peptide released from approximately 60 % to about 40 % in the same span of time .
【GOLD_E】
maleimide	chem
【PRE_E】
maleimide	chem
【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_R】

Cellular signaling crosstalk between multiple receptors for investigation of pathophysiology in multifactorial diseases - - what is clinically - relevant crosstalk ?
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recently , genomics and proteomics have been utilized as advanced tools for investigation of cellular signaling pathways and molecular interactions , and elucidated promiscuous networks composed of numerous interactions among pathways .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , some of these interactions are considered to be simply contributing to background ' noise ' and others are as ' crosstalk ' biologically - relevant to cellular physiology , leading to synergy effects more than additive responses in an entire organism .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Effort is now required to determine which interactions truly contribute to final physiological output .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A receptor is the prime example of connectors among the networks .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It functions , not simply as a signaling gateway , but also as an active trader by forming inter - receptor dimers .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
inter-receptor	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Furthermore , various receptors can modulate the function of the other receptors by input to common intracellular signaling pathways , establishing functional crosstalk among networks .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Our findings by combined analyses of gene polymorphisms of two separate genes present evidences that such is the case with human body in a clinical setting : 1 ) an integrated effect of epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) and protease activated receptor - 1 ( PAR - 1 ) on susceptibility to airway hyperresponsiveness ( AHR ) , and 2 ) a crosstalk effect between muscarinic acetylcholine receptor ( mAChRs ) and β ( 2 ) adrenoceptor ( β ( 2 ) AR ) on bronchodilatory response to anticholinergic agents in patients with COPD .
【GOLD_E】
acetylcholine	chem
epidermalgrowthfactorreceptor	geneY
EGFR	geneY
proteaseactivatedreceptor-1	geneY
PAR-1	geneY
muscarinicacetylcholinereceptor	geneN
mAChRs	geneN
β(2)adrenoceptor	geneY
β(2)AR	geneY
【PRE_E】
epidermalgrowthfactorreceptor	geneY
EGFR	geneY
proteaseactivatedreceptor-1	geneY
PAR-1	geneY
AHR	geneY
muscarinicacetylcholinereceptor	geneN
mAChRs	geneY
β(2)adrenoceptor	geneY
β(2)AR	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These results indicate that these interactions are unlikely to be ' noise ' but functionally - relevant ' crosstalk ' in a human body .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This review attempts to highlight the clinically - relevant ' crosstalk ' paradigm in a human body which provides us a novel insight necessary to investigate pathophysiology in common multifactorial diseases and to develop new drugs .
【GOLD_E】

Given the importance of the finding that suggests a novel pathway of regulation of skeletal muscle , we aim to examine the effects of phosphorylation on cross - bridge orientation and rotational motion .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We find that : ( i ) relaxed cross - bridges , but not active ones , are statistically better ordered in muscle where the RLC is dephosporylated compared with phosphorylated RLC ; ( ii ) relaxed phosphorylated and dephosphorylated cross - bridges rotate equally slowly ; and ( iii ) active phosphorylated cross - bridges rotate considerably faster than dephosphorylated ones during isometric contraction but the duty cycle remained the same , suggesting that both phosphorylated and dephosphorylated muscles develop the same isometric tension at full Ca ( 2 + ) saturation .

【PRE_R】

Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease : current issues and novel treatment approaches .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease ( NAFLD ) is considered the most common liver disorder in the Western world .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It is commonly associated with insulin resistance , obesity , dyslipidaemia , type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) and cardiovascular disease .
【GOLD_E】
insulin	geneY
【PRE_E】
insulin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Nonalcoholic steatohepatitis ( NASH ) is characterized by steatosis with necroinflammation and eventual fibrosis , which can lead to end - stage liver disease and hepatocellular carcinoma .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Its pathogenesis is complex , and involves a state of ' lipotoxicity ' in which insulin resistance , with increased free fatty acid release from adipose tissue to the liver , play a key role in the onset of a ' lipotoxic liver disease ' and its progression to NASH .
【GOLD_E】
freefattyacid	chem
insulin	geneY
【PRE_E】
insulin	geneY
fattyacid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The diagnosis of NASH is challenging , as most affected patients are symptom free and the role of routine screening is not clearly established .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A complete medical history is important to rule out other causes of fatty liver disease ( alcohol abuse , medications , other ) .
【GOLD_E】
alcohol	chem
【PRE_E】
fatty	chem
alcohol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Plasma aminotransferase levels and liver ultrasound are helpful in the diagnosis of NAFLD / NASH , but a liver biopsy is often required for a definitive diagnosis .
【GOLD_E】
Plasmaaminotransferase	geneN
【PRE_E】
aminotransferase	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , there is an active search for plasma biomarkers and imaging techniques that may non - invasively aid in the diagnosis .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The treatment of NASH requires a multifaceted approach .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The goal is to reverse obesity - associated lipotoxicity and insulin resistance via lifestyle intervention .
【GOLD_E】
insulin	geneY
【PRE_E】
lipotoxicity	geneY
insulin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although there is no pharmacological agent approved for the treatment of NAFLD , vitamin E ( in patients without T2DM ) and the thiazolidinedione pioglitazone ( in patients with and without T2DM ) have shown the most consistent results in randomized controlled trials .
【GOLD_E】
vitaminE	chem
pioglitazone	chem
【PRE_E】
NAFLD	geneY
vitaminE	chem
thiazolidinedione	chem
pioglitazone	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This review concentrates on our current understanding of the disease , with a focus on the existing therapeutic approaches and potential future pharmacological developments for NAFLD and NASH .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
NAFLD	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Nuclear receptors in bile acid metabolism .
【GOLD_E】
Nuclearreceptors	geneN
bileacid	chem
【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

Bile acids are signaling molecules that activate nuclear receptors , such as farnesoid X receptor , pregnane X receptor , constitutive androstane receptor , and vitamin D receptor , and play a critical role in the regulation of lipid , glucose , energy , and drug metabolism .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_R】

These xenobiotic / endobiotic - sensing nuclear receptors regulate phase I oxidation , phase II conjugation , and phase III transport in bile acid and drug metabolism in the digestive system .
【GOLD_E】
xenobiotic/endobiotic-sensingnuclearreceptors	geneN
bileacid	chem
【PRE_E】
endobiotic-sensingnuclearreceptors	geneN
bileacid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Integration of bile acid metabolism with drug metabolism controls absorption , transport , and metabolism of nutrients and drugs to maintain metabolic homeostasis and also protects against liver injury , inflammation , and related metabolic diseases , such as nonalcoholic fatty liver disease , diabetes , and obesity .
【GOLD_E】
bileacid	chem
【PRE_E】
bileacid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Bile - acid - based drugs targeting nuclear receptors are in clinical trials for treating cholestatic liver diseases and fatty liver disease .

RIF1 is essential for 53BP1 - dependent nonhomologous end joining and suppression of DNA double - strand break resection .
【GOLD_E】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

53BP1 and BRCA1 directly influence DSB repair pathway choice by regulating 5 ' end resection , but how this is achieved remains uncertain .
【GOLD_E】

The inappropriate accumulation of RIF1 at DSBs in S phase is antagonized by BRCA1 , and deletion of Rif1 suppresses toxic nonhomologous end joining ( NHEJ ) induced by PARP inhibition in Brca1 - deficient cells .

Metal - pernitride compounds belong to a class of chemical systems in which both the complex ions and the non - bonding electrons may play roles in the formation of their modified crystalline structures .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
pernitride	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To investigate this issue , the energy landscapes of pernitrides of metals with different maximum valence ( M = Ca , Sr , Ba , La , and Ti ) were globally explored on the ab initio level at standard and high pressures , thereby yielding possible ( meta ) stable modifications in these systems together with information on how the landscape changed as function of the valence of the metal cation .

25 - Hydroxyvitamin D in Obese Youth Across the Spectrum of Glucose Tolerance From Normal to Prediabetes to Type 2 Diabetes .
【GOLD_E】
25-HydroxyvitaminD	chem
Glucose	chem
【PRE_E】
25-HydroxyvitaminD	geneY
Glucose	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

OBJECTIVETo 1 ) determine if plasma 25 - hydroxyvitamin D ( 25 [ OH ] D ) concentrations differ among obese youth with normal glucose tolerance ( NGT ) versus prediabetes versus type 2 diabetes , and 2 ) assess the relationships between 25 ( OH ) D and in vivo insulin sensitivity and β - cell function in this cohort.RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODSPlasma 25 ( OH ) D concentrations were examined in banked specimens in 9 - to 20 - year - old obese youth ( n = 175 ; male 42.3 % , black 46.3 % ) ( NGT , n = 105 ; impaired glucose tolerance [ IGT ] , n = 43 ; type 2 diabetes , n = 27 ) who had in vivo insulin sensitivity and secretion measured by hyperinsulinemic - euglycemic and hyperglycemic clamp techniques and had an assessment of total body composition and abdominal adiposity.RESULTSThe mean age and BMI of the subjects were 14.3 ± 2.1 years and 35.7 ± 5.6 kg / m ( 2 ) , respectively .
【GOLD_E】
glucose	chem
25[OH]D	chem
insulin	geneY
insulin	geneY
glucose	chem
25(OH)D	chem
25(OH)D	chem
25-hydroxyvitaminD	chem
【PRE_E】
25-hydroxyvitaminD(25[OH]D	chem
glucose	chem
25(OH)D	chem
insulin	geneY
25(OH)D	chem
glucose	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

BMI , plasma 25 ( OH ) D , and the proportion of vitamin D - deficient and - insufficient children did not differ across the three groups .
【GOLD_E】
25(OH)D	chem
vitaminD	chem
【PRE_E】
25(OH)D	chem
vitaminD	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Furthermore , there was no association between 25 ( OH ) D and in vivo insulin sensitivity or β - cell function relative to insulin sensitivity ( disposition index ) in all groups combined or in each group separately.CONCLUSIONSOur data in obese youth show 1 ) no differences in plasma 25 ( OH ) D concentrations across the glucose tolerance groups , and 2 ) no relationship between 25 ( OH ) D and in vivo insulin sensitivity and β - cell function relative to insulin sensitivity in any of the groups .

Cystathionase mediates senescence evasion in melanocytes and melanoma cells .
【GOLD_E】
Cystathionase	geneY
【PRE_E】
Cystathionase	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The development of malignant melanoma is a highly complex process , which is still poorly understood .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A majority of human melanomas are found to express a few oncogenic proteins , such as mutant RAS and BRAF variants .
【GOLD_E】
RAS	geneN
BRAF	geneY
【PRE_E】
RAS	geneN
BRAF	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , these oncogenes are also found in nevi , and it is now a well - accepted fact that their expression alone leads to senescence .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This renders the understanding of senescence escape mechanisms an important point to understand tumor development .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Here , we approached the question of senescence evasion by expressing the transcription factor v - myc myelocytomatosis viral oncogene homolog ( c - MYC ) , which is known to act synergistically with many oncogenes , in melanocytes .
【GOLD_E】
v-mycmyelocytomatosisviraloncogenehomolog	geneY
c-MYC	geneY
【PRE_E】
v-mycmyelocytomatosisviraloncogenehomolog	geneY
c-MYC	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We observed that MYC drives the evasion of reactive - oxygen stress - induced melanocyte senescence , caused by activated receptor tyrosine kinase signaling .

tyrosine	chem
【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

MIZ1	geneY

Investigational anti - hyperglycemic agents : the future of type 2 diabetes therapy ?
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

As the pandemic of type 2 diabetes spreads globally , clinicians face many challenges in treating an increasingly diverse patient population varying in age , comorbidities , and socioeconomic status .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Current therapies for type 2 diabetes are often unable to alter the natural course of the disease and provide durable glycemic control , and side effects in the context of individual patient characteristics often limit treatment choices .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This often results in the progression to insulin use and complex regimens that are difficult to maintain .
【GOLD_E】
insulin	geneY
【PRE_E】
insulin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Therefore , a number of agents are being developed to better address the pathogenesis of type 2 diabetes and to overcome limitations of current therapies .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The hope is to provide more options for glucose lowering and complication reduction with less risk for hypoglycemia and other adverse effects .
【GOLD_E】
glucose	chem
【PRE_E】
glucose	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These agents include newer incretin - based therapies and PPAR agonists , as well as new therapeutic classes such as sodium - coupled glucose cotransporter 2 inhibitors , free fatty acid receptor agonists , 11 - β - hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase type 1 inhibitors , glucokinase activators , and several others that may enter clinical use over the next decade .
【GOLD_E】
incretin	geneN
PPAR	geneN
sodium-coupledglucosecotransporter2	geneY
fattyacid	chem
11-β-hydroxysteroid	chem
sodium	chem
glucose	chem
freefattyacidreceptor	geneN
11-β-hydroxysteroiddehydrogenasetype1	geneY
glucokinase	geneY
【PRE_E】
incretin	geneN
PPAR	geneY
sodium	chem
glucosecotransporter2	geneY
fattyacidreceptor	geneN
11-β-hydroxysteroiddehydrogenasetype1	geneY
glucokinase	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Herein we review these agents that are advancing through clinical trials and describe the rationale behind their use , mechanisms of action , and potential for glucose lowering , as well as what is known of their limitations .
【GOLD_E】
glucose	chem
【PRE_E】

【PRE_E】

【PRE_E】
3-methylglutaconic	chem

【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_E】
3-methylglutaconic	chem
【PRE_E】
3-methylglutaconic	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Three percent of all urine samples of the patients referred showed 3 - methylglutaconic aciduria , often in correlation with disorders not reported earlier in association with 3 - methylglutaconic aciduria ( e.g . organic acidurias , urea cycle disorders , haematological and neuromuscular disorders ) .

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This work reports on the composition and bionutritional value of organic virgin olive oil from the Nocellara del Belice variety , one cultivated in the olive areas of the Sicily region , Italy .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Destoned oils obtained by processing olives with a destoning - based procedure were compared with conventional oils .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This innovative technique , consisting in removing the stone from fruits prior to processing , strongly enhanced the already high - quality level of the conventional product .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

An in - depth analytical investigation from 2008 to 2010 showed how this innovative olive extraction process led to an excellent peculiar final product , mainly attributable to the improved biophenol and volatile composition , as well as higher concentrations of the lipophilic and vitamin antioxidants ( tocopherols and tocotrienols ) .
【GOLD_E】

Overall it was found that styelsamine analogues were stronger DNA binders , with the natural products styelsamines B and D having particularly high affinity ( K ( app ) 5.33 × 10 ( 6 ) and 3.64 × 10 ( 6 ) M ( - 1 ) , respectively ) .

Intercalation pathway in many - particle LiFePO4 electrode revealed by nanoscale state - of - charge mapping .
【GOLD_E】
LiFePO4	chem
【PRE_E】
LiFePO4	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The intercalation pathway of lithium iron phosphate ( LFP ) in the positive electrode of a lithium - ion battery was probed at the ∼ 40 nm length scale using oxidation - state - sensitive X - ray microscopy .
【GOLD_E】
lithiumironphosphate	chem
LFP	chem
lithium	chem
【PRE_E】
lithium	chem
ironphosphate	chem
LFP	chem
lithium	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Combined with morphological observations of the same exact locations using transmission electron microscopy , we quantified the local state - of - charge of approximately 450 individual LFP particles over nearly the entire thickness of the porous electrode .
【GOLD_E】
LFP	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

With the electrode charged to 50 % state - of - charge in 0.5 h , we observed that the overwhelming majority of particles were either almost completely delithiated or lithiated .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
lithiated	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Specifically , only ∼ 2 % of individual particles were at an intermediate state - of - charge .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

From this small fraction of particles that were actively undergoing delithiation , we conclude that the time needed to charge a particle is ∼ 1 / 50 the time needed to charge the entire particle ensemble .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Surprisingly , we observed a very weak correlation between the sequence of delithiation and the particle size , contrary to the common expectation that smaller particles delithiate before larger ones .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
delithiation	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Our quantitative results unambiguously confirm the mosaic ( particle - by - particle ) pathway of intercalation and suggest that the rate - limiting process of charging is initiating the phase transformation by , for example , a nucleation - like event .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Therefore , strategies for further enhancing the performance of LFP electrodes should not focus on increasing the phase - boundary velocity but on the rate of phase - transformation initiation .
【GOLD_E】
LFP	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Avibactam ( formerly NXL104 , AVE1330A ) is a synthetic non - β - lactam , β - lactamase inhibitor that inhibits the activities of Ambler class A and C β - lactamases and some Ambler class D enzymes .
【GOLD_E】

This review summarizes the existing data published for ceftazidime - avibactam , including relevant chemistry , mechanisms of action and resistance , microbiology , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics , and efficacy and safety data from animal and human trials .
【GOLD_E】

avibactam	chem
【PRE_E】
ceftazidime	chem
avibactam	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although not a β - lactam , the chemical structure of avibactam closely resembles portions of the cephem bicyclic ring system , and avibactam has been shown to bond covalently to β - lactamases .

Pharmacodynamic data suggest that ceftazidime - avibactam is rapidly bactericidal versus β - lactamase - producing Gram - negative bacilli that are not inhibited by ceftazidime alone.Clinical trials to date have reported that ceftazidime - avibactam is as effective as standard carbapenem therapy in complicated intra - abdominal infection and complicated urinary tract infection , including infection caused by cephalosporin - resistant Gram - negative isolates .

Family studies have reported a moderate contribution of genetics to variation in macronutrient intake .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In a genome - wide meta - analysis of a population - based discovery cohort ( n = 33 533 ) , rs838133 in FGF21 ( 19q13.33 ) , rs197273 near TRAF family member - associated NF - kappa - B activator ( TANK ) ( 2p24.2 ) , and rs10163409 in FTO ( 16q12.2 ) were among the top associations ( P < 10 ( - 5 ) ) for percentage of total caloric intake from protein and carbohydrate . rs838133 was replicated in silico in an independent sample from the Cohorts for Heart and Aging Research in Genomic Epidemiology Consortium ( CHARGE ) Nutrition Working Group ( n = 38 360 ) and attained genome - wide significance in combined analysis ( Pjoint = 7.9 × 10 ( - 9 ) ) .

AtO ( + ) is the dominant species existing under oxidizing and acidic pH conditions .
【GOLD_E】
AtO(+)	chem
【PRE_E】
AtO(+)	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This is consistent with high - performance ion - exchange chromatography data showing the existence of one species holding one positive charge .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

A change in speciation occurs as the pH changes from 1 to 4 , while remaining under oxidizing conditions .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Dynamic experiments with ion - exchange resins evidence the existence of a neutral species witnessed by its elution in the void volume .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
AtO(OH)	chem
【PRE_E】
AtO	chem
OH	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The hydrolysis thermodynamic constant , extrapolated to zero ionic strength , was determined to be 10 ( - 1.9 ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This value is supported by two - component relativistic quantum calculations and therefore allows disclosing unambiguously the structure of the formed species .

【PRE_E】

The population pharmacokinetics ( PPK ) of atorvastatin and its principal active metabolite , o - hydroxyatorvastatin , were described in 6 - 17 years old pediatric hypercholesterolemia patients with a 2 - compartment model for both parent and metabolite .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
atorvastatin	chem
o-hydroxyatorvastatin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Informative prior distributions on selected parameters , based on adult data , were required to stabilize the model and were implemented using a Bayesian penalty term on the likelihood function in the nonlinear mixed effects model ( NONMEM VI with PRIOR ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Concentrations below the limit of quantitation were treated as censored data using a conditional likelihood function .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

When scaled allometrically , CL / F was similar to values reported for adults .

Expression of pituitary FSH and LH , under the control of pulsatile GnRH , is essential for fertility . cAMP response element - binding protein ( CREB ) has been implicated in the regulation of FSHβ gene expression , but the molecular mechanisms by which pulsatile GnRH regulates CREB activation remain poorly understood .

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Acute exposure to ultraviolet ( UV ) radiation causes pro - inflammatory responses via diverse mechanisms including oxidative stress .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Codium fragile is a green alga of Codiales family and has been reported to exhibit anti - edema , anti - allergic , anti - protozoal and anti - mycobacterial activities .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
Codiales	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In HaCaT cells , buthanol and ethylacetate fractions of 80 % methanol C. fragile extract ( CFB or CFE ) and a single compound , clerosterol ( CLS ) isolated from CFE attenuated UVB ( 60mJ / cm ( 2 ) ) - induced cytotoxicity and reduced expression of pro - inflammatory proteins including cyclooxygenase - 2 ( COX - 2 ) , inducible nitric oxide synthase ( iNOS ) , and tumor necrosis factor - α ( TNF - α ) .

If the samples are exposed to air prior to electrochemistry , both ORR and carbon oxidation signals are absent , and instead only small capacitive currents or currents attributed to redox chemistry of adventitious organic adsorbates are observed , indicating that air exposure results in passivation of the small Pt clusters .
【GOLD_E】
carbon	chem

【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

Unlike rats and mice , Siberian hamsters and humans do not increase food intake after food deprivation , but increase food hoarding after food deprivation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In Siberian hamsters , exogenous ghrelin increases ingestive behaviors similarly to 48 - 56h food deprivation .
【GOLD_E】
ghrelin	geneY
【PRE_E】
ghrelin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Therefore , we tested the necessity of increased ghrelin in food - deprived Siberian hamsters to stimulate ingestive behaviors .
【GOLD_E】
ghrelin	geneY
【PRE_E】
ghrelin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To do so we used our simulated natural housing system that allows hamsters to forage for and hoard food .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Animals were given an injection of GO - CoA - Tat ( i.p . , 11μmol / kg ) every 6h because that is the duration of its effective inhibition of octanoylated ghrelin concentrations during a 48h food deprivation .
【GOLD_E】
octanoylatedghrelin	geneN
【PRE_E】
GO-CoA	chem
octanoylatedghrelin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

We found that GO - CoA - Tat attenuated food foraging ( 0 - 1h ) , food intake ( 0 - 1 and 2 - 4h ) , and food hoarding ( 0 - 1h and 2 and 3days ) post - refeeding compared with saline treated animals .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
GO-CoA	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

【PRE_R】

Stabilisation of amorphous drugs under high humidity using pharmaceutical thin films .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In this study , the stabilization effects of three polymers on four model drugs ( felodipine , fenofibrate , carbamazepine , and celecoxib ) under saturated humidity were investigated .
【GOLD_E】
carbamazepine	chem
celecoxib	chem
felodipine	chem
fenofibrate	chem
【PRE_E】
felodipine	chem
fenofibrate	chem
carbamazepine	chem
celecoxib	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Three different types of thin films ( solid dispersions , drug films with a polymer film coating and drug films laid on top of polymer coated surfaces ) were prepared and compared with films containing the drug alone .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

ATR - FTIR spectroscopy , polarised light microscopy ( PLM ) , scanning electron microscopy ( SEM ) and nano - thermal analysis ( nano - TA ) were performed on the model systems after storage under saturated humidity .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The recrystallisation tendency of the drug in the drug containing thin films was found to be strongly related to the intrinsic crystallization tendency of the drug film alone and the strength of drug - polymer interactions .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Additionally , under high humidity , the glass transition temperature of the polymer is no longer an indicator of its drug stabilization capability .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Instead , it is the hygroscobicity of the polymer that appears to be the most important parameter .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Amongst the polymers tested in this study , EUDRAGIT E PO was found to have the greatest inhibitory effect on crystallization , whilst PVP K30 was found to have the least protective effect ; presumably because of its hygroscopic nature .
【GOLD_E】
EUDRAGITEPO	chem
PVPK30	chem
【PRE_E】

PVPK30	chem

【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】

Three variables of cardiac vagal effects ( the root mean square of successive differences [ rMSSD ] in the interbeat interval of the heart rate [ IBI ] , heart - rate variability [ HRV ] caused by peak - valley respiratory sinus arrhythmia [ pvRSA ] , and high - frequency power [ HF ] ) and heart rate ( HR ) were obtained at seven time points during the clamps , characterised by increasing levels of insulin ( achieved by administering insulin plus glucose , glucose only , glucose and GLP - 1 , and glucose and GLP - 1 combined with arginine ) .

Switchable Elastin - Like Polypeptides that Respond to Chemical Inducers of Dimerization .
【GOLD_E】
Elastin-LikePolypeptides	geneN
【PRE_E】
Elastin	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Elastin - like polypeptides ( ELPs ) are protein polymers that reversibly phase separate in response to increased temperature , pressure , concentration , ionic strength , and molecular weight .
【GOLD_E】
Elastin-likepolypeptides	geneN
ELPs	geneN
【PRE_E】
Elastin-likepolypeptides	geneN
ELPs	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

If it were possible to engineer their phase separation to respond to specific molecular substrates , ELP fusion proteins might be engineered as biosensors , smart biomaterials , diagnostic imaging agents , and targeted therapies .
【GOLD_E】
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
ELP	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

What has been lacking is a strategy to design ELPs to respond to specific substrates .
【GOLD_E】
ELPs	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To address this deficiency , we report that ELP fusion proteins phase separate in response to chemical inducers of dimerization ( CID ) .
【GOLD_E】
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
ELP	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The rationale is that ELP phase separation depends on molecular weight , concentration , and local hydrophobicity ; therefore , processes that affect these properties , including noncovalent dimerization , can be tuned to produce isothermal phase separation .
【GOLD_E】
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To test this hypothesis , constructs were evaluated consisting of an immunophilin : human FK - 506 binding protein 12 ( FKBP ) attached to an ELP .
【GOLD_E】
immunophilin	geneN
humanFK-506bindingprotein12	geneY
FK-506	chem
FKBP	geneY
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
immunophilin	geneN
humanFK-506bindingprotein12	geneY
FKBP	geneY
ELP	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Under stoichiometric binding of a CID , the fusion protein homodimerizes and triggers phase separation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
proteinhomodimerizes	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This dimerization is reversible upon saturation with excess CID or competitive binding of a small lipophilic macrolide to FKBP .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
CID	chem
macrolide	chem
FKBP	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

By modulating the ELP molecular weight , phase separation was tuned for isothermal response to CID at physiological ionic strength and temperature ( 37 °C ) .
【GOLD_E】
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To interpret the relationship between transition temperature and equilibrium binding constants , an empirical mathematical model was employed .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To the best of our knowledge , this report is the first demonstration of reversible ELP switching in response to controlled dimerization .
【GOLD_E】
ELP	geneN
【PRE_E】
ELP	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Due to its simplicity , this strategy may be useful to design ELP fusion proteins that respond to specific dimeric biological entities .

Memory disturbances described in post - traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) patients are believed to be associated with changes in neuronal activity , in particular at the level of the hippocampus .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【PRE_E】

METHODS : Mice received two unavoidable electric foot - shocks .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Then , 1 or 16 days after stress , they were tested for their memory performance using the object recognition test .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Neuronal excitability was recorded during the third week post - stress in the CA1 area of the hippocampus .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Drugs were administered from day 1 post - stress to the day preceding the electrophysiological study .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : Application of electric shocks produced cognitive impairment 16 , but not 1 day after stress , an effect which was associated with a decrease in hippocampal neuronal excitability .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Both stress - induced effects were prevented by repeated administration of SSR125543 , paroxetine and D - cycloserine .

CONCLUSIONS : These findings confirm that the CRF ( 1 ) receptor antagonist SSR125543 is able to attenuate the behavioral effects of traumatic stress exposure and indicate that these effects are associated with a normalization of hippocampal neuronal excitability impaired by stress .

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , DNA supercoiling at a genomic scale in human cells is uncharacterized .

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

underwounddomains	geneN
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Atorvastatin withdrawal elicits oxidative / nitrosative damage in the rat cerebral cortex .
【GOLD_E】
Atorvastatin	chem
【PRE_E】
Atorvastatin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Statins are inhibitors of the enzyme 3 - hydroxy - 3 - methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase , the rate - limiting step in cholesterol biosynthesis .
【GOLD_E】
3-hydroxy-3-methylglutarylcoenzymeA	chem
3-hydroxy-3-methylglutarylcoenzymeAreductase	geneY

【PRE_E】

【GOLD_R】
cholesterol	3-hydroxy-3-methylglutarylcoenzymeAreductase	C9
【PRE_R】

Statins effectively prevent and reduce the risk of coronary artery disease through lowering serum cholesterol , and also exert anti - thrombotic , anti - inflammatory and antioxidant effects independently of changes in cholesterol levels .
【GOLD_E】
cholesterol	chem
cholesterol	chem
【PRE_E】
cholesterol	chem
cholesterol	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

On the other hand , clinical and experimental evidence suggests that abrupt cessation of statin treatment ( i.e . statin withdrawal ) is associated with a deleterious rebound phenomenon .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In fact , statin withdrawal increases the risk of thrombotic vascular events , causes impairment of endothelium - dependent relaxation and facilitates experimental seizures .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

However , evidence for statin withdrawal - induced detrimental effects to the brain parenchyma is still lacking .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

In the present study adult male Wistar rats were treated with atorvastatin for seven days ( 10mg / kg / day ) and neurochemical assays were performed in the cerebral cortex 30min ( atorvastatin treatment ) or 24h ( atorvastatin withdrawal ) after the last atorvastatin administration .

【PRE_R】

Cardiac hypertrophy , structural remodeling , and expression of the genes associated with fatty acid metabolism were examined in rats treated with triiodothyronine ( T3 ) alone ( 8 μg / 100 g body weight ( BW ) , i.p . ) for 15 days or along with a peroxisome proliferator - activated receptor alpha agonist bezafibrate ( Bzf ; 30 μg / 100 g BW , oral ) and were found to improve in the Bzf co - treated condition .

【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For exploring the effect of polymer hydrophilicity on nanoparticle interactions with human umbilical vein endothelial cells ( HUVECs ) in vitro , a series of monomodal poly [ acrylonitrile - co - ( N - vinylpyrrolidone ) ] model nanoparticles with increasing hydrophilicity as related to their increasing content ( 0 - 30mol . % ) of N - vinylpyrrolidone ( NVP ) were synthesized by miniemulsion polymerization .

【PRE_E】

miniemulsion	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Nanoparticles with a low NVP content were rapidly endocytized into all cells independent from the particle dose with toxic effects only observed at high particle concentrations , while only 10 - 30 % of the cells incorporated particles with ⩾ 20mol . % NVP .

【PRE_R】

Since pathologies are often related to inflammation , an inflammatory HUVEC culture condition with IL - 1β stimulation has been introduced and suggested to be widely applied for studying nanocarriers , since cellular uptake in this assay was clearly increased for NVP contents ⩾ 20mol . % .

PURPOSE : Omeprazole has ( R ) - and ( S ) - enantiomers , which exhibit different pharmacokinetics ( PK ) among patients with cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) 2C19 genotype groups .

The aim of this study was to investigate whether the 1 - point , 4 - h postdose ( R ) - omeprazole hydroxylation index ( HI ) of racemic omeprazole reflects the three CYP2C19 genotype groups in Japanese individuals .
【GOLD_E】

METHODS : Ninety healthy Japanese individuals were enrolled and classified into the three different CYP2C19 genotype groups : homozygous extensive metabolizers ( hmEMs ; n = 34 ) , heterozygous EMs ( htEMs ; n = 44 ) , and poor metabolizers ( PMs ; n = 12 ) .
【GOLD_E】
CYP2C19	geneY
【PRE_E】
CYP2C19	geneY
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Blood samples were drawn 4 h after the intake of an oral dose of omeprazole 40 mg , and plasma levels of omeprazole and its metabolites were analyzed by high - performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) using a chiral column .
【GOLD_E】

CONCLUSION : Our findings demonstrate that ( R ) - omeprazole HI correlated better with CYP2C19 genotype groups than racemic - omeprazole HI , and these results may be useful for classification among patients in CYP2C19 genotype groups prior to omeprazole treatment .

Many transporters and DMEs are regulated by xenobiotic receptors [ XRs ; e.g . , pregnane X receptor ( PXR ) , constitutive androstane receptor ( CAR ) , and Aryl hydrocarbon receptor ( AhR ) ] ; however , there is a paucity of information regarding the influence of opioids on XRs .

Three XRs ( e.g . , PXR , CAR , and AhR ) , 27 transporters ( e.g . , ABCB1 and SLC22A8 ) , and 19 DMEs ( e.g . , CYP2B2 and CYP3A1 ) were regulated ( P < 0.05 ) with fold changes ranging from - 46.3 to 17.1 .

Taken together , these findings identify a signature hepatic gene - network associated with repeated oxycodone administration in rats and demonstrate that oxycodone alters the expression of many transporters and DMEs ( without direct activation of PXR , CAR , and AhR ) , which could lead to undesirable DDIs after coadministration of substrates of these transporters / DMEs with oxycodone .

Dysregulation of one - carbon metabolism - related metabolic processes is a major contributor to the pathogenesis of nonalcoholic fatty liver disease ( NAFLD ) .
【GOLD_E】
carbon	chem
【PRE_E】
carbon	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It is well established that genetic and gender - specific variations in one - carbon metabolism contribute to the vulnerability to NAFLD in humans .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_E】
carbon	chem
NAFLD	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

To examine the role of one - carbon metabolism dysregulation in the pathogenesis and individual susceptibility to NAFLD , we used a `` population - based `` mouse model where male mice from 7 inbred were fed a choline - and folate - deficient ( CFD ) diet for 12 wk .
【GOLD_E】

【PRE_R】

Strain - dependent down - regulation of several key one - carbon metabolism genes , including methionine adenosyltransferase 1α ( Mat1a ) , cystathionine - β - synthase ( Cbs ) , methylenetetrahydrofolate reductase ( Mthfr ) , adenosyl - homocysteinase ( Ahcy ) , and methylenetetrahydrofolate dehydrogenase 1 ( Mthfd1 ) , was observed .

【PRE_R】

The strain specificity of diet - induced dysregulation of one - carbon metabolism suggests that interstrain variation in the regulation of one - carbon metabolism may contribute to the differential vulnerability to NFLD and that correcting the imbalance may be considered as preventive and treatment strategies for NAFLD . - Pogribny , I .

Vitamin A and retinoid signaling : genomic and non - genomic effects .
【GOLD_E】

retinoid	chem
【PRE_E】
VitaminA	chem
retinoid	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Vitamin A or retinol is arguably the most multifunctional vitamin in the human body as it is essential from embryogenesis to adulthood .
【GOLD_E】
VitaminA	chem
retinol	chem
vitamin	chem
【PRE_E】
VitaminA	chem
retinol	chem
vitamin	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The pleiotropic effects of vitamin A are exerted mainly by one active metabolite , all - trans retinoic acid ( atRA ) , which regulates the expression of a battery of target genes through several families of nuclear receptors ( RARs , RXRs and PPARβ / δ ) , polymorphic retinoic acid ( RA ) response elements and multiple coregulators .

Role of oxidative stress in chemical allergens induced skin cells activation .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Allergic contact dermatitis ( ACD ) is an important occupational and environmental disease caused by topical exposure to chemical allergens .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

It describes the adverse effects that may results when exposure to a chemical elicits a T cell - mediated inflammatory skin disease .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The ability of contact sensitizers to induce the oxidative stress pathway in keratinocytes and dendritic cells has been confirmed by several authors .

【PRE_E】

Non - front - fanged colubroid snakes : A current evidence - based analysis of medical significance .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Non - front - fanged colubroid snakes ( NFFC ; formerly and artificially taxonomically assembled as `` colubrids `` ) comprise about 70 % of extant snake species and include several taxa now known to cause lethal or life threatening envenoming in humans .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Although the medical risks of bites by only a handful of species have been documented , a growing number of NFFC are implicated in medically significant bites .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
NFFC	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The majority of these snakes have oral products ( Duvernoy 's secretions , or venoms ) with unknown biomedical properties and their potential for causing harm in humans is unknown .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Increasingly , multiple NFFC species are entering the commercial snake trade posing an uncertain risk .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
NFFC	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Published case reports describing NFFC bites were assessed for evidence - based value , clinical detail and verified species identification .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These data were subjected to meta - analysis and a hazard index was generated for select taxa .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Cases on which we consulted or personally treated were included and subjected to the same assessment criteria .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Cases involving approximately 120 species met the selection criteria , and a small subset designated Hazard Level 1 ( most hazardous ) , contained 5 species with lethal potential .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recommended management of these cases included antivenom for 3 species , Dispholidus typus , Rhabdophis tiginis , Rhabdophis subminiatus , whereas others in this subset without commercially available antivenoms ( Thelotornis spp . ) were treated with plasma / erythrocyte replacement therapy and supportive care .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Heparin , antifibrinolytics and / or plasmapheresis / exchange transfusion have been used in the management of some Hazard Level 1 envenomings , but evidence - based analysis positively contraindicates the use of any of these interventions .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
antifibrinolytics	chem
plasmapheresis	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Hazard Level 2 / 3 species were involved in cases containing mixed quality data that implicated these taxa ( e.g .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Boiga irregularis , Philodryas olfersii , Malpolon monspessulanus ) with bites that caused rare systemic effects .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Recommended management may include use of acetylcholinesterase inhibitors ( e.g . neostigmine ) and wound care on a case - by - case basis .
【GOLD_E】
neostigmine	chem
acetylcholinesterase	geneY
【PRE_E】
acetylcholinesterase	geneY
neostigmine	chem
【GOLD_R】
neostigmine	acetylcholinesterase	C4
【PRE_R】
acetylcholinesterase	neostigmine	C4

Hazard level 3 species comprised a larger group capable of producing significant local effects only , often associated with a protracted bite ( eg Heterodon nasicus , Borikenophis ( Alsophis ) portoricensis , Platyceps ( Coluber ) rhodorachis ) .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Management is restricted to wound care .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Bites by Hazard level 4 species comprised the majority of surveyed taxa and these showed only minor effects of no clinical importance .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This study has produced a comprehensive evidence - based listing of NFFC snakes tabulated against medical significance of bites , together with best - practice management recommendations .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This analysis assumes increasing importance , as there is growing exposure to lesser - known NFFC snakes , particularly in captive collections that may uncover further species of significance in the future .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Careful and accurate documentation of bites by verified species of NFFC snakes is required to increase the evidence base and establish the best medical management approach for each species .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
NFFC	geneN
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Cell cycle arrest , extracellular matrix changes and intrinsic apoptosis in human melanoma cells are induced by Boron Neutron Capture Therapy .
【GOLD_E】
Boron	chem
【PRE_E】
Boron	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Boron Neutron Capture Therapy ( BNCT ) involves the selective accumulation of boron carriers in tumor tissue followed by irradiation with a thermal or epithermal neutron beam .
【GOLD_E】
Boron	chem
【PRE_E】
Boron	chem
boron	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

This therapy is therefore a cellular irradiation suited to treat tumors that have infiltrated into healthy tissues .

【PRE_R】

At 6 h after injection of the compound ( 400 mg / kg ) into rats bearing hepatoma 3924A , the pools of L - glutamine and L - glutamate in the tumor decreased to 33 % and 71 % , respectively , of control levels ; the drug selectively inhibited the activities of L - glutamine - requiring enzymes of purine nucleotide biosynthesis , amidophosphoribosyltransferase , FGAM synthase , and GMP synthase , to 21 % , 1 % , and 69 % , respectively , without significantly altering the activities of pyrimidine biosynthetic enzymes , carbamoylphosphate synthase II and CTP synthase .

Reinforcement enhancing effects of nicotine via smoking .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RATIONALE : In animals , nicotine enhances reinforcement from stimuli unrelated to nicotine intake .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Human research is suggestive but has not clearly shown a similar influence of nicotine .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

OBJECTIVES : We assessed acute effects of nicotine via smoking on enhancement of positive ( money , music ) or negative ( termination of noise ) reinforcers , or no `` reward `` ( control ) .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

These different rewards determined the generalizability of nicotine effects .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

MATERIALS AND METHODS : Dependent ( n = 25 ) and nondependent ( n = 27 ) smokers participated in three sessions , each after overnight abstinence .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Using a within - subjects design , sessions involved no smoking or smoking denicotinized ( 0.05 mg ) or nicotine ( 0.6 mg ) Quest ( R ) brand cigarettes .
【GOLD_E】
icotine(	chem
【PRE_E】
denicotinized	chem
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

For comparison , a fourth session involved no abstinence prior to smoking one 's own brand to gauge responses under typical nicotine satiation .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
abstinence	chem
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Reinforcement was assessed by responses on a simple operant computer task for the rewards , each available singly on a progressive ratio schedule during separate trials .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

RESULTS : The reinforcing effect of music , but not other rewards , was greater due to the nicotine cigarette , compared to the denicotinized cigarette or no smoking .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Reinforcement enhancing effects of nicotine did not differ between dependent and nondependent groups , indicating no influence of withdrawal relief .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Responding due to acute nicotine after abstinence was very similar to responding to one 's own brand after no abstinence .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
abstinence	chem
abstinence	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

CONCLUSIONS : Acute nicotine intake per se from smoking after abstinence enhances the reinforcing value of rewards unassociated with smoking , perhaps in a manner comparable to ad lib smoking after no abstinence .
【GOLD_E】
nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
nicotine	chem
abstinence	chem
abstinence	chem
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Nicotine 's reinforcement enhancing effects may be specific to certain rewards , perhaps those sensory in nature .
【GOLD_E】
Nicotine	chem
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

The cardiomyocyte apoptosis plays a critical role in the development of myocardial injury after ischemia and reperfusion .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Thus , alteration of the major apoptosis - regulatory factors during myocardial ischemia - reperfusion is expected to have favorable cardioprotective effects .
【GOLD_E】
【PRE_E】
【GOLD_R】
【PRE_R】

Herein , we report ischemic - reperfused myocardial infarction ( MI ) repair with siRNA against Src homology region 2 domain - containing tyrosine phosphatase - 1 ( SHP - 1 ) , which is known as a key factor involved in regulating the progress of apoptosis in many cell types .

A low molecular weight polyethyleneimine modified with deoxycholic acid ( PEI1.8 - DA ) - based delivery strategy was suggested for the cardiac application of SHP - 1 siRNA to overcome the poor gene delivery efficiency to myocardium due to the highly charged structures of the compact cardiac muscles .

Chagas disease ( human American trypanosomiasis ) , which is caused by the protozoan parasite Trypanosoma cruzi , is responsible for numerous deaths each year ; however , established treatments for the disease are limited .

protozoanparasiteTrypanosomacruzi	geneN

Differentiation - inducing factor - 1 ( DIF - 1 ) and DIF - 3 are chlorinated alkylphenones originally found in the cellular slime mold Dictyostelium discoideum that have been shown to possess pharmacological activities .
